title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well, because it will give them a new perspective on certain aspects. Those people who do not try new things can never find new aspects of life. For instance, trying new studies will help people to find their ability and starting new hobbies will give them a new, fun time. Starting unfamiliar studies is not an easy option, but the choice will lead to intellectual improvement for people. For example, the person who favors writing literature can find their hidden ability in completely another subject. The person can start learning how to communicate with the audience, or students.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: The given statement is "It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject". I disagree with the above statement because, having broad knowledge of many academic subjects seems to be alright when in childhood, but this seems to be complex and cumbersome as we grow older and older. Firstly, if we have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject, it becomes difficult to identify our main domain properly. For example, consider a high school student. If he needs to have broad knowledge of many subjects even after his high school, apart from his personal interest which he shows in a particular subject, the decision-making strategy of perceiving higher studies becomes troublesome. Secondly, if we have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, the frequency at which we do get updates about these subjects greatly matters. We need to have a greater frequency of updation in all areas, which is not a simpler task. For example, consider a student studying Computer Sciences. The other academic subjects include some main aspects from Electronics, Electricals, Communications and, likewise.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Most people have had this feeling yet: these moments when you think you will never know enough, but they always fascinate us meeting people with knowledge in a wide variety of domains. But we also learn from our development that it is often better to concentrate on something to protect ourselves from confusion. So when we have to decide to study a special subject, we have to think about what is really interesting for us an d where are our potentials and resources. By paying attention to that we can focus on a subject we can make much better efforts at than others because of our talents and so on. This is positive for our self - esteem, because we know that we can do some things (it doesn`t have to be only one thing, but it can also not be everything) really good and that differs us from others in apositive way. Specializing in one special subject has also good outcomes for society. Your expertise serves the progress in Science in an amount a broad knowledge couldn`t reach. But a personal problem for me is: I`m a psychology student and I know the themes of psychology are more and more interesting for great enterprises to improve the motivation of their workers and also their security and health.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree that most young people do not give enough time to helping their communities. There should be an energy when young people around the neighborhood, but nowadays they don't care about the environment they live in. It is sad that people can't see young people attending the activities of their communities. The reasons that cause this situation are competition, education and value. First, competition is the main reason that young people don't want to participate in any activities. There is more stress on their shoulders, such as academic assignment and making friends. They want to be the best and perform well in school to get into the best senior high or colleges. It is usually that most young students in Taiwan will go to cram school after their daily classes. They have to sacrifice their playing time to achieve their goal. They try to get into a public university because the tuition is higher than before.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Twenty Years Later? It is considered that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. This statement may become true or false, because it is a guess but why did people believe in that guess or not. First of all I strongly believed in that statement. As time passes, transportation and different ways of transporting are being improved and while improving it is being cheaper. What improvements the transportation can see; subways, busses, railways with comfortable trains, planes, jet planes etc. Why costs of transportation with these vehicles will be cheaper; because with supply and demand balances in the economy, the increased numbers in cars increases demand for fuel oil and supply is constant and decreasing because it is fossil energy. As a result the prices of fuel oil will be increased. so people will choose to travel by bus, subway or unbelievable but expected by plane. Because of improvements in the transportation paths people can reach everywhere from their home by these vehicles. I think it is an obvious choice: if you have the chanceto go to your work by subway; you will go to your work by subway. That is why; because you will not choose to wait in your car alone in the traffic and you will not give a lot of money to fuel oil and you will choose to read your book or newspaper while travelling. On the other hand people's choices will change while travelling along the cities; people prefer to use planes to go to Antalya from Istanbul or from Antalya to Istanbul - from a metropolis city to a tourist city in Turkey - rather than travelling by bus or by car. Because for making another guess; in twenty years time will be the most valuable thing in the world of all. Time is a valuable thing now; but in twenty years it will be the most valuable thing that people will pay for a plane ticket for not being late for life. In all these respects above; transportation will see great changes in the aspect of people'slives. These changes will be rooted from the improvements in transportation vehicles and economic conditions for instance in the fuel oil people face.
sents: ["Twenty Years Later? It is considered that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. This statement may become true or false, because it is a guess but why did people believe in that guess or not. First of all I strongly believed in that statement. As time passes, transportation and different ways of transporting are being improved and while improving it is being cheaper. What improvements the transportation can see; subways, busses, railways with comfortable trains, planes, jet planes etc. Why costs of transportation with these vehicles will be cheaper; because with supply and demand balances in the economy, the increased numbers in cars increases demand for fuel oil and supply is constant and decreasing because it is fossil energy. As a result the prices of fuel oil will be increased. so people will choose to travel by bus, subway or unbelievable but expected by plane. Because of improvements in the transportation paths people can reach everywhere from their home by these vehicles. I think it is an obvious choice: if you have the chanceto go to your work by subway; you will go to your work by subway. That is why; because you will not choose to wait in your car alone in the traffic and you will not give a lot of money to fuel oil and you will choose to read your book or newspaper while travelling. On the other hand people's choices will change while travelling along the cities; people prefer to use planes to go to Antalya from Istanbul or from Antalya to Istanbul - from a metropolis city to a tourist city in Turkey - rather than travelling by bus or by car. Because for making another guess; in twenty years time will be the most valuable thing in the world of all. Time is a valuable thing now; but in twenty years it will be the most valuable thing that people will pay for a plane ticket for not being late for life. In all these respects above; transportation will see great changes in the aspect of people'slives.", 'These changes will be rooted from the improvements in transportation vehicles and economic conditions for instance in the fuel oil people face.']

text: I think that it is more important for students to learn facts than it is for them to understand ideas and concepts. My choice is based on two reasons. The first reason is that, if you learn facts, you have direct contact with reality. For example, at university, you can learn more skills if you follow a laboratory than if you follow a lesson of theory. This is a good way not only for a student, but also for a worker.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays young people don't spend their time helping their communities. In my opinion young people should be more involved in their communities. Young people should deal with the problems of their communities. Nevertheless, young people have to deal with many problems related to their life. As a consequence, they don't have time to help their communities. On the one hand, I believe that young people should try to eliminate the negative aspects of their society. On the other hand, I think that the communities must understand the young people's problems and try to solve them. Young people have a lot of problems during their life. In particular, they have social problems. For example, they have difficulties having relationships and they are not able to relate with society. As a result they prefer to stay alone. Furthermore, in many cases young people during their studies must find absolutely a job. Young people after work want to spend their time with their friends or family. Moreover sometimes young people disagree with the decisions taken by their communities. As a consequence they do to want to help them.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Nowadays, it is important in times of applying at a university to consider rather study generalistically or specify in a certain subject. Before applying students should take the following aspects into consideration. Firstly, it is often mentioned that being a specialist in a certain area makes it easier once you have finished university to apply for the position you are exactly trained for at an organisation. However, having a broad knowledge of many academic subjects gives you the possibility to apply for a wider range of job-ads. Being generalistically offers you a way to enter a company more easily. Once you have received the job you can still and you even have to, no matter being a specialist or a generalist, adapt to the needs of the company you are working for. Secondly, it is argued that specifying in a certain field does not take the same time as studying the basics of many different areas. To some limited extent there is some truth in it, but, undoubtedly, experience shows that no matter what way of studying you have chosen the time until achieving a degree is the same. Nevertheless, doing a generalistical degree is in my opinion, better than completing a specific degree that takes the same time. In other words your possibilities are much broader after the study time finding a job then they would only bespecified. And the time you have spent remains the same. To summarize, students first of all should be aware of the consequences when considering applying after they have obtained a degree in a specific subject.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Travling costs a lot of money. Have you ever thought about how much you spend when you travel? A lot of people love travelling but they do not want to spend a lot of money on travelling. When people travelled to a different place about which they did not have any information, they would get lost while they were looking for the places they wanted to visit. Therefore, having a tour guide with you on your travelling can take you to beautiful places in a short time. There fore I agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide because by that, the tour guide entertains you and saves your time which are the most important things during your travelling. The first benefit of having a tour guide is that he entertains you. the tour guide has a big knowledge of the place where he tours you. For example, suppose you do not know about the good places in California and you went to them. If you did not have a tour guide, you would not have any good places except the ones that are near by your hotel. In addition, if asked people about the good places, they would not tell you because they might not remember them. However the tour guide job is to know the good places that will make the tourists entertained. Finally, the tour guide would try his hardest to entertain you, so that you might like him and tell other people about him. The second point is that the tour guide would save a lot of your time. For example, one of my friends went to Riyadh, which is the capital city of Saudi Arabia, with out a tour guide.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. Our common sense is not to try towad risk area. however, No trying new things means no new happening in our lives. As I read this statement, I remember the pastor Cho's story who established the full gospel church in Seoul. He started a small church in the country side which lived with many poor people. As his ministry grew, he moved to a bigger church. His church number was around 1000 numbers. God gave the vision to build a huge church which was available to participate in over 20,000 people. He didn't have money as well as huge space to build it at that time. He couldn't see any reasonable things to start it. It was big risk. It might be worse if it influenced his church numbers because all the elders of the church did not agree with his opinion. However, He began it against all environments and conditions. So some of the church numbers left from his church due to risk and the expectation of harsh punishment for the new church. But His church number became over 700,000 numbers because the location of the church was built, became the core of the city of seoul. All so important buildings such as the building of the national broad casting and government , were established there.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Travelling is one of the most popular pastimes. Most people usually plan to travel across the country or overseas in their own life. They enjoy talking about diverse experiences where each person traveled. From my experience, I agree with the travel in a group led by a tour guide for some economical and exciting reasons. Firstly, I like to travel in groups led by a tour guide because I can save more money and time. A tour guide is professional enough to give us more information suited to the places that we want to travel to. In addition, a tour guide needs to compete with other agencies, and it tries to give more benefits to its clients. A tour guide also has a lot of experienced information about what I want to travel, so it is kind to consult her to give information. The more important reason for agreeing is that we enjoy much more than traveling with several people for themselves.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I dislike the idea that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Normally older people have more free time and more money than younger people, and they also have a chance to fall in love. My grand mother travels every month with her many friends. Most young people want to go travelling but they do not have enough money and time to do it. Most young people have to work and it is difficult to take a vacation. However most retired older people have a lot of time, the y have some money to enjoy their life because they are getting retirement money from the government. Now, there are dating clubs for seniors in Japan. These are very famous in Japan.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I disagree with the topic. Young people nowadays do give enough time to helping their communities. Even though the system is becoming more and more mechanical the helping nature of the young is not degrading. They really show up and help when the time comes for doing that. Consider the example of Katrina hurricane. The hurricane left many people homeless and made many children orphans. During that time students and other young people through out the world gave help. Students have established many camps around the victimized areas to help the people. Many people from foreign nations have also helped their best by donating their pocket money. Even though many of the students are busy with their college schedule, they devote some time to social service. Many students from clubs in their college help the underprivileged kids and others. This I am stating from my personal experience. I am a member of a rotract club in college. Me along with some other students have arranged a camp in college to encourage the underprivileged kids. We went to an orphanage and brought a few kids to our college and gave them training in sketching, fabric painting, clay modelling etc. We have this program once in a semester and the members of the group work for two to three days on it. Even though many companies do have a charity trust to help the community.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: It is commonly said that young people enjoy life more than older people do however there are so many many points we have to consider before agreeing or disagreeing with such opinions First, and most importantly in my opinion it depends on the person 's character rather than his age. Some people prefer a sedentary life style ,like working ,going home , watching TV. etc. These people never get to have social life or they tend to keep it as minimal as possible. Here I am giving an example of a younger person who would not enjoy much of life when he was young so when they grow older and retire ,they do not really have much hobbies or interests in their life so they would definitely say that young people enjoy life more probably because mainly when they leave home ,it is related to work. Not that they should not be working but they should find other things in life to enjoy and try to find something they like and learn how to better at ,or share it with friends ,etc. Second , another point to take into consideration is the surrounding environment where the person lives. Some people live in big cities where there is always something to do ,while others live in smaller communities where there is not much going on in their small town. Nevertheless it depends on where the person grewup ,not only on where they live,as for instance if someone grows up in a small town ,he might already know what to do in his spare time ,like may be go fishing if he lives in a city by alley or river ,on the other hand if a person grows up in a large city and it happens that he moves to that exact small city for whatever reason ,he may not know what to do there. Third , there is a different kind of enjoyment for every age ,it is just a matter of the person finding the appropriate way of enjoying his or her life. A person should be ready to accept the fact that he or she is getting older and at some stage of his life he or she might not be able to do the same kind of things that he is used to doing. Fourth,technology and computers have changed our lives. In a way positively impacted us by being able to find a lot of things on the internet and make it easier for all ages to find things they would like.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: In this text i will discuss the question " Young people enjoy life more than older people do". First I have to say that everybody will be old one day and this is my first argument. When young people think "I will be old sometime" they often think of "but not yet and I have enough time to enjoy my life! ". Then young people often do something forbidden or something "freaky". For example I read about parcour. Parcour means that you run across a city and always run straight on even if there are cars, garages and houses. You just climb up the wall and then jump down and that is what many young people do. For older people enjoying life is often spending time withfamily, going travelling and reading something in which they are interested. For example can everybody remember his grandmother or grandfather doing something that your parents would never have allowed or something like that? And most people think that only older people have got the money to travel to hotels? Older people mostly just enjoy their life. But young people are often not allowed to do the things they want to do and often the parents are the reason for that. title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Building knowledge of many academic subjects is much better than specializing in one specific subject in my opinion. Not only because it will be more interesting but also because people will benefit more if the subjects are varied. The main reason that broadening knowledge is more helpful is that people will be aware of many things in this world. they can expand their knowledge in an easy way too. If the subjects are limited, a lot of people wont care to know about other things in the world or in the kingdom which we live in. They will be satisfied to have the information that is collected around the environment they live in. I cant judge and say that all people will have poor knowledge, but i'm sure that the majority will have that good knowledge.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: This is a controversial issue to define the important factor for students. Someone's priority knowledge of ideas and concepts that students gain is the most important factor in education However, others may say that experiences from facts are an important factor for students. These priorities would depend on everyone's previous life experience. In my case, I grew up in a school that gave me a mixed educational method,and that the method was equally balanced. Since I recognise mixed educational policy, both factors are key to obtaining better concepts, and at least I can say both factors were needed and just one of those would not bring a significant result. When I was an elementary school student, I learned the concept of insects. That was the first time that someone told me a concept. I was engrossed in the ideas and bought many books about insects. This easy introduction of concept brought me a significant amount of knowledge even though I spent my time and funds to have more knowledge of insects.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Some people think students should learn the result of facts. Even though that is important for students, I myself believe comprehension of ideas and concepts are more necessary for modern life. People are able to manage their skills in their life easily. For example, when a person knows how to figure out math concepts, the person can use the math ideas to develop in the computer programming field. If the person wants to be a computer programmer, the concepts of math skills always help the person to improve the business. Learning facts is risky to interfere with students' motivation. It is always fun to think and create the answer even though the answer is wrong. Students always think about their problems so that they can discover themselves to solve the problems. For example, in math class students always spend a lot of time considering to figure out the answer. People can cooperate with their friends to overcome and find solusion. This process helps students to make motivation for studying. Finally, learning only results is not always true. Again, math class could be a good example. Many people notice that text books often have some mistakes. When a student only learns the facts, a student might misunderstand everything. Therefore, there are three reasons that I do not agree to learn only facts. Understanding ideas and concepts helps people to use their particular subject in their life easily. Also, this has probably to improve students' motivation for studying.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I definitely agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. It's the way to sell products a few times. First of all, for making good products , companies need to have expensive and good materials or things. It does nt matter what kind of product it is, they don't want to spend a lot of money on their products. Because they want to earn more and everybody knows that the best way to sell a product is advertising it. Advertisements show these products as if they are great. Obviously they lie to people. But companies don't know that its not a good idea to do that. Maybe for a few times they will earn more money than they expected. However later on , these products lost their popularity. Because people understand that these products are not as good as they hope. People absolutely know what is good for them. So that company will fall down as fast as it grew up! It will lose all its money, probably more than it earned from the first time. I think the best way to produce products is to make them as well as the company can. After this ,they can advertise it and it will be so successful and popular for the people and actually they can make really good money in that way. I believe that people must be against these kinds of products, because we spend our money on lies and nobody gives it back to us. Maybe if we were against these products that they are not good as adversisements show to us , Maybe our grandchildren wouldn't see this kind of lie and bad products. If we against them and do not buy this kind of company's products , they will be gone. After that actually we can trust the people. We dont have to think twice before we buy something. The most important point here that i wanna focus on is lying to people. If you lie to someone, even though you will tell the truth next time, they wo not believe you. The main point is not to think only about ourselves.

Also the reason why the companies are making the advertisements that make products seem much better than they really are is because they have confidence and pride in their products. The companies really want people to buy their products. Moreover, it is a kind of competition between companies and each other.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I think that new things in life can be discovered only if there is perfect observation. If it isn't there then it's not possible to discover new things. Some believe that taking risks in life may go ahead but others think that it's better to do what we know. But i think that successful people try new things and take risks. I have several reasons for holding my opinion. If a person is working in a factory and his boss has allocated a particular job and he is confused then it will be difficult for him to do that work. But if he takes risks and tries to solve that problem then it would be very easy to help his boss. Scientists are even inventing more things by taking risks. For example, while inventing a computer it was difficult for them to select what was necessary for inventing it. But, at that time if they did not take risks then it would be difficult for them to invent a computer. I would like to give an example of an everyday life. Some people spend their money on buying lottery tickets by taking risks. But if they get double the money then it would be useful for them. And as such they will be benefited by taking risks. if a person is shy or is not ready to take risks then he might miss an opportunity to get a.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement that says that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. In my personal opinion, I think that taking risks and trying new things we can have more fun in our lives. If we do not know how to do something, we have to take the risk of learning to do that thing that we do not know. Maybe it will not be easy but it cold helps us to grow up as a person and can help us to have an exit. People who do not want to have an exit in their lives always do the same thing all their lives. That would be really boring and sad. As human beings we have to have something to encourage us to be a better person. That something could be trying new things. Doing new things means we can open the door to reach the exit in our lives which is what everybody wants; also can develop the different skills that we have and we can realize our value as human beings. To have an exit in our lives can help us to find the happiness that we have been looking for all our entired lives and can help us to share that happiness with the people that we love, and can also encourage others to follow and reach their dreams and to be successful people.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. That is because young people are busy with their business time and in their private time. Let me explain why young people are busy in those two times. In business time,young people are apt to have a lot of tasks compared to a business person in 20 years ago. In this two decades,most companies in the world have been decreasing redundant costs. So a lot of workers are dismissed. Consequently business people who can avoid lay offs have a lot of tasks which dismissed workers have. In my case,I work at a famous bank in Japan which is Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi. I always work from 9 am to 22 pm because of having many tasks. Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi made a lay off last year. 2000 workers were dismissed. In my department which is composed of 8 bankers,two old bankers were dismissed. So the tasks for 6 bankers increased. Therefore I do not have enough time to help my communities on weekdays. In private time,young people are also busy. Young people have a lot of media,for instance mobile phones and the internet, compared to a person in 20 years ago. So young people are apt to spend a lot of time using those medicines.

Consequently business people who can avoid lay offs have a lot of tasks which dismissed workers have. In my case,I work at a famous bank in Japan which is Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi. I always work from 9 am to 22 pm because of having many tasks. Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi made a lay off last year. 2000 workers were dismissed. In my department which is composed of 8 bankers,two old bankers were dismissed. So the tasks for 6 bankers increased. Therefore I do not have enough time to help my communities on weekdays. In private time,young people are also busy. Young people have a lot of media,for instance mobile phones and the internet, compared to a person in 20 years ago. So young people are apt to spend a lot of time using those medicines.', 'From my experience,my mobile phone rings 20 times a day.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement. People try things that they don't know very well. The risk is a part of life and many people believe that this is the only thing to carry on living. I think it's very sad. The quotidianity is also very important and to appreciate small things in each day is an other way to live. This statement can have negative effects on people's lives. The teenagers often try things that are very dangerous to be appreciated by other members of a group. They take risks only to be part of something. They don't hear what their parents tell them and they do what kind of stupid things. They drive a car at high speed, for example. Recently, I was watching television when I saw a girl who had had an accident in a car. She killed three guys and she only said : " Luckily, I wasn't in our place". Incredible! She killed three innocent people.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Youth are the back bone of any nation. The development of a nation is in their hands. So they do a lot of things which include helping to communities. Being of the same group I would like to disagree with the statement. Youth have a lot of responsibilities in building a strong nation. Though they are involved in their restless work they do spend some time on the benefits of others. The strong reason for my disagreement is they help the community with their profession also. There are hell lot of young entrepreneurs who are looking forward to helping society by providing employment. I would like to mention the charitable organisations being established by various MNC's where a lot of young people work for them. They concentrate on various basic activities like drinking water ,laying roads, conducting awareness camps ,oldage homes. All these organisations are run by young people in a fantastic way. Though they do not directly involve the action they are the back bones of various organisations. I would like to notify you of this example from my personal life ,during our college days we used to dedicate 2 Saturdays every month to planting trees in various communities beside our college and we were aware of that and taking that spirit we are still continuing. The works done by young people do not attract mass media or other means as they feel it as a duty rather than responsibility. The awareness camp conducted by young people against AIDS has been an excellent program in the history of our country. Helping others need not require any organisation and work under it can be a small help that you contributed to others' welfare and especially for the needy. In a nut shell ,I state that being considered as a duty young people play a key role in improving the standards of society by contributing quality of work without being exposed to media beinga reason to supress our efforts.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: In the modern world, we have learned almost every subject until university. And many students who graduate university are complaining about this education system. Because when they get a job, they don't use the knowledge they learned in school. I can understand their opinion. In some parts I agree with that. However, it can't be a reason that we just have to learn one specific subject. Learning a variety of knowledge is very helpful for people to be a specialist in some area. If someone wants to be a biologist, he needs to experience other subjects. Mathematics, Literature, Athletics. etc.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Being young is the reason for being active for a long time and being active would naturally imply being in a state to enjoy for a longer time. But there are some exceptions where even older people show their activity for a long time which is in rare situations. Young people can easily do the activities which older people struggle for. But even there are some old people who do things easily. Older people usually never dare for adventures in their life for enjoyment, whereas most young people will not hesitate to go for adventures for enjoyment.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Products seem much better than they really are? I agree. These days the best seem product is the best seller. For me there are three reasons why this happens. First the price of the product. Second the way of the owner presents the product tosociety. Last but not least the quantity of money that the producer will spend on making the product. Let's talk about price. The money is the one that moves the world. In the United States the biggest society class is the middle one , that means the worker class. Most of the population will be looking for the cheap product. The advertisements make the product look good and if the price is good people will buy the product. The first impression of the product, is what we first look at. The promotion is very important, if the advertisements convince the person thatthe product is good they will buy it. Also people do not have too much time to look at the difference between the products and if in the promotions it says that it is the best seller you will buy it without notice that doesn't mean that it is the best one. The company cost for making the productis the most important thing forthem. Alot of companies prefer safe money, to selling to the people a good product. A good example of that is the food, natural food is better but artificial flavor is cheapest, so flavor maybe it will be better but it is not because it is not natural. In conclusion will produce will make them products seem better than other because ofmarket competition. My advice is to always look for the contents of the products if they are foot, medicines or any supplements. If it is a transportation like cars, equipment, etc ; look at the material that is composed of which will help you to know which one is better. Mos importan look for seconds opinions or compare products so you by your own self determine which one is better for you.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement which says that "young people enjoy life more than older people do". There are different types of reasons and examples i can give for agreeing with the statement. There are many common reasons,such as we can play for long hours in the playground. But old people cannot play for long hours as they do not have sufficient energy. Young people can work for a long time and lift things that have more weight. But where as old people cannot work for long times and they can only lift things that are low in weight due to their lack of strength. Young people can have a lot of food when compared to old people. Young people enjoy life by travelling to different places and staying there. Where as old people cannot walk for long hours,so they cannot visit many places but rather sit at home and enjoy watching TV. Young people can drink beers and dance in discos continuously.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There is an argument concerning whether young people enjoy life more or older people do. It is true that young people are hard to study and old people are hard to work. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Even if I am not asked, I am sure that there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. There are 3 principal reasons. In this essay, I will introduce them. First, we must quit using our cars inevitably when we think about the environment. Driving our cars links to increasing environmental problems. CO2 which cars exhaust rises our planet's temperature, kills a lot of forests, and causes dirty air we breatheeveryday. So, we have to cease driving cars rather than will do. Secondly, there will be no more rooms where we can park cars in common. Today, we have a lot of buildings, amusement parks, and other public facilities. There are few empty areas in Japan. And this must continue in the future. Cars are big objects. We will use not the big one but a small convenient object like a bike or our feet. Finally, about ourselves' health. Because cars are so fast and comfortable, we often use cars. When we drive cars, what we only use is our arms.
sents: ["Even if I am not asked, I am sure that there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. There are 3 principal reasons. In this essay, I will introduce them. CO2 which cars exhaust rises our planet's temperature, kills a lot of forests, and causes dirty air we breatheeveryday. So, we have to cease driving cars rather than will do. Secondly, there will be no more rooms where we can park cars in common. Today, we have a lot of buildings, amusement parks, and other public facilities. There are few empty areas in Japan. And this must continue in the future. Cars are big objects. We will use not the big one but a small convenient object like a bike or our feet. Finally, about ourselves' health. Because cars are so fast and comfortable, we often use cars.", 'When we drive cars, what we only use is our arms.']

Only the people who have money will get the 'future transport' or may be that the really 'future transport' will be the bicycle. Nobody knows this yet. On the one hand, we have all these points but on the other hand it implies that many people who work in making cars or people who sell them, people that deal with cars will have problems. May be they will lose their job or something like that and it would be a really great problem. If in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today people will walk more and do more sport which helps their bodies to be fine.

Only the people who have money will get the 'future transport' or may be that the really 'future transport' will be the bicycle. Nobody knows this yet. On the one hand, we have all these points but on the other hand it implies that many people who work in making cars or people who sell them, people that deal with cars will have problems. May be they will lose their job or something like that and it would be a really great problem.", 'If in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today people will walk more and do more sport which helps their bodies to be fine.']

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Yes , I agree with the Statement "The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide ". Willing to travel along with a group of people is a good option rather than travelling alone. There were many factors which would benefit us while we were travelling in a group led by a tour guide. Firstly ,by considering the security factor which is a big task in tours especially in foreign countries ,we can feel more security while we are along with a group of people rather than alone. Even in the case of some tough situations we will get the support of everybody in a group. Secondly ,travelling in a group is economically more recommended than travelling alone. We can share the experiences and joy while we are travelling in a group and we can benefit from most of the expenditures we will face. Many tourism departments in various countries are offering good tourism packages for people who are coming for foreign tours. They are providing discounts and valid packages especially for people travelling in a group rather than travelling alone. Thirdly ,we can have a planned timetable and we can have a lot of fun all along the tour along with our group members ,we can plan more programmes and events which will entertain us along with our fellow members and we can even have a large.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Nowadays,more and more people say that young people enjoy life more than older people do. They think that many young people buy luxuries things,spend more and more time and money on the internet and video games. The older people,however,always spend their time doing the housework,or watching the TV at home. But is it true that young people enjoy life more than older people do? I think I cannot agree with this saying. Because every person in one's life has its own features. We cannot only say that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Firstly,older people always think everything in their way,so maybe they think the next generation is not as good as them. For example,the kids who were born in the 1960s and after were called The Generation Who Can't Support. But they are the main part of the economy and power now. They are excellent as their father and grandfather. So the viewpoint that young people enjoy life more than older people is just a stereotype. Secondly,I think every old person has ever been young before. So they must know that young people are much more active than older people. They go to a club or play basketball when they are free. They cannot stop moving. But it is not to enjoy life,it is the instinctive of the young man. That does not mean that the young man enjoys life more than older people. Thirdly,many older people know how to enjoy life more than young people. Because many young people don't have enough money to enjoy life. They need to word.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with people who try new things and take risks rather than doing one thing that they already know how to do well. People who always try new things  are more creative and innovative than others. They have an ambition to do new things and try to get the success with it. They even have to take risks with it, because of doing the new things that nobody is trying to do, they will get more precious and helpful experiences in their life time. They are the people who other people want nowadays, for example, even in large companies where they try to hire new employees, they will search for people with a creative mind not the people who have the same mind as any others. Of course, some companies could look for people who are ordinary and not try new things and keep going on with the old ones. However we can see in our environments, the people who try new things and take risks are the leaders in their areas because that is what the companies want. The people who only do one thing and do not want to take the risks of it, are the ones who get the introductions from the people above them and do what they do well usually do.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Since the invention of the first car, their amount has always increased causing a lot of damage to the environment. Nevertheless,I believe that in twenty years, this worrying tendency will decrease. First of all, it will be very harmful to the environment if the amount of cars tends to increase more and more. That is why, in the next few years, the government will have to take strict measures to prevent people from using their cars every day. There already are some measures such as when the pollution is too high , only certain kinds of car are allowed to circulate. But , as far as I am concerned, the government should do more and strengthen the law. They can develop public transport and make it cheaper for me. Moreover, the price of fuel has strongly increased, and it will cost and will cost more money to travel by car, even if other energy is developed. Many people cannot afford to pay more and will find more benefits not using their car, but rather public transport. An other reason makes me believe that the number of cars will decrease. Indeed, technological progress is more and more developed and performed quickly. In a few years, Cars will be replaced by some innovations which enable people to move cheaper, faster and easier. To conclude, even if automobile firms intend to create cheaper and more environmentally friendly cars, I think that news innovation will be created in the expanse of the cars.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: My altitude toward advertisers has changed. At first, I hated them because they always cut my favourite TV programs into pieces. Now, however, I like it; numerous wonderful products in commercials make me feel that "What a wonderful world. ". But when I think of advertisements rationally, I would say: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are because of the function of advertisements, the improved measures to make a commercial and the psychological effects on money holders. As we all know, the function of an advertisement is to make a product sold better. Thus, a product will be described as good as possible in a commercial. After a deal, though a buyer would find that the product isn't as good as he thought at first, as a result of human's laziness, if the product is OK, he probably won't return it to the retailer. In this situation, advertising works. Advertisements good-looking also owned to the improvement in the ways to make commercials. For example, the IPOD, which is so popular among students that it's even a kind of scholarship in my school. The commercial for the IPOD uses artificial background and illustrated human body as a theme song. It successfully reflects the spirit of freedom and individualism, therefore meeting the needs of students' even though the IPOD's performance is not that good. The psychology effect of buyers also makes the commodities in commerce more attractive. When people watch a commercial, the stimulation of good pictures and nice voices which introduce the features of the product often makes them imagine a lot of functions of the product which they will never use in the future. Thus, the product seems worse than the on in the commercial. But it's not the commercial's fault, it's a mistake made by your imagination. All in all, the reason why is.

Thus, the product seems worse than the on in the commercial. But it\'s not the commercial\'s fault, it\'s a mistake made by your imagination.', 'All in all, the reason why is.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Let me introduce myself first. I am from Japan and have grown up there. I totally agree that young people recently do not give enough time to helping their communities. Some reasons why young people do not are that in Japanese society, there are more interests, such as playing video games and intervention like busystudying. Or young people tend not to have any interests in others. Most elderly people say "a long time ago young people had sufficient time for helping their communities. "However, time is always changing, therefore, young people do not want to help or not like their communities at all. Even if their parents may not care about those communities, so they might not push their sons or daughters to go to communities. On the other hand, because Japanese people are studying so harder than playing, and some young people have to focus on studying instead of helping the communities, they do not have time to go to communities. Not only Japanese people study so hard, but also do Asian people study very hard if we compare between Asia and North America. Americans may have enough time to help their communities because I saw young Americans using my eyes. Also, I heard from my friends who are Americans that Japanese people are studying harder than Americans. It means that Japanese people do not have time to help their communities. In Japan, there are some of the worst booms for young people. We called the boom: "Hikikomori Phenomenon. "Young Japanese (young adults too! )tends to stay at their houses, especially, and spend time there in a whole day.

Some reasons why young people do not are that in Japanese society, there are more interests, such as playing video games and intervention like busystudying. Or young people tend not to have any interests in others. Most elderly people say "a long time ago young people had sufficient time for helping their communities. "However, time is always changing, therefore, young people do not want to help or not like their communities at all. Even if their parents may not care about those communities, so they might not push their sons or daughters to go to communities. On the other hand, because Japanese people are studying so harder than playing, and some young people have to focus on studying instead of helping the communities, they do not have time to go to communities. Not only Japanese people study so hard, but also do Asian people study very hard if we compare between Asia and North America. Americans may have enough time to help their communities because I saw young Americans using my eyes. Also, I heard from my friends who are Americans that Japanese people are studying harder than Americans. It means that Japanese people do not have time to help their communities. In Japan, there are some of the worst booms for young people. We called the boom: "Hikikomori Phenomenon.', '"Young Japanese (young adults too! )tends to stay at their houses, especially, and spend time there in a whole day.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We often hear the word "NEET" in Japan, NEET is the person who has only part time jobs or does not have jobs. I have some friends who are NEET. They have free time, so they can enjoy life without thinking about time or dates. Now, I am a graduate student. I work in my laboratory from early morning to late at night everyday. I am busy everyday, so I am always thinking that I want to have a rest. For me, I sometimes envy NEET's life because they have freedom. However, I don't think that it is good that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I have 2 reasons. First, young people need a lot of money if they want to enjoy life like older people. But in most cases, many young people earn so much money. If they get money from their parents, I think they should not enjoy life like older people. The money that older people use to enjoy life is earned by themselves. But the money that young people use is not ! I think that it is very hard to earn money by yourself. When we realize this, we know the importance of money and we appreciate money. If they spend a lot of money without knowing it, it is very dangerous. Second, I think that we work so hard when we are young. When we are young, we can move freely. When we are young, it is better that we enjoy only doing things we are young.

Second, I think that we work so hard when we are young. When we are young, we can move freely.', 'When we are young, it is better that we enjoy only doing things we are young.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Actually, both of them enjoy their life. But, there is a difference between young people and older people. Older people don't have much energy like young people. They've worked hard for a long time, and it's possible that they have already seen many good things, and had experiences before. Therefore, they'll not be interested in doing or enjoying many things. Some old people really enjoy their life, but I think young people can enjoy it more than older people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. This is like this. A lot of younger people are very enthusiastic about their young life to explore new things so as to enjoy the maximum extent as the older people who have experienced almost all the things in their life tend to relax in their older ages. Now, young people who are new to the world with new intentions like to spend their time enjoying life as much as possible like doing many things, such as going to the theaters to watch films and pubs every weekend to have fun, can play a lot of games together and even participate in high level tournaments, can have sex, can enjoy their university life as a student and many other things. Many of these things can also be enjoyed by older people but they are bored with doing them as they did a lot in their young life. Playing sports requires a lot of strength and energy which older people lack. Having a lot of parties with friends in young life is another important thing to be considered which older people may find difficult to do as often as young people do and they also think that they are a waste of money. To some extent even older people who are still interested will enjoy attending the parties and pubs. One more important thing is the student life, which will not be repeated again. Students enjoy themselves a lot in universities in many respects such as sports, research and even in some other co-curricular activities. Older people can definitely not do that again, but can enjoy it as a professor which is quite different from student life.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I really agree with the statement. In Italy, the place where I live there are a lot of advertisements that make products seem much better than they really are, I hope these advertisements will disappear because I think that the way people spend money is not a joke. I could write a lot of examples about these things. I have a friend, Kate, she bought a shower gel that ensures her body skin becomes smooth just like silk, but it isn't the truth! Another example could be the lcd televisions that clerks encourage you to buy with the promise of a great view and a lot of light, but then you discover that you need to submit a new pay-per-view frequency to see it.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Do young people enjoy life more than older people do? The person who asks this question in the present day may receive more positive answers. Yet, I think this question will have a varied answer due to the time it is asked. In the present day, new technologies keep being developed each day. For most parts, young children and adolescents are usually the targets of the technologies which are designed for them. The gaming consoler war (PS3, Xbox360, Netindo Wii) during last Christmas appeared to be a perfect example. The gaming market has targeted all the younger groups instead of those older people. Therefore, young people have more choices to relax right now and in the future. Also, most considered "young" people are still in the process of learning. It can have more possibilities to develop new interests while learning or trying a new thing. Once the interest is ensured, young people know how they should have fun with it. Yet, that applies to the present day. On the other hand, if this question was being asked in the past like in the 18th or even 16th century , then most answers may appear to be towards older people. In the past, young people had to deal with educational and economic problems harder than those well-established adults. The younger groups did not appear to have time to enjoy life before they grew  up. But older people might enjoy life as much as they can. By looking over the history, old barons and nobles had way more advantage in enjoying life than young children.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: To my mind older people enjoy life more than young people and I will explain why. Despite the fact that young people begin their life, they will have a lot of things to do, a lot of places to visit and a lot of people to meet, they also face up to several problems. First of them, due to the aging population and the increase in study level, they will have to work for too many years to hope for a quiet retirement. In contrast to the older who retired around sixty years old. The young people will not benefit from their reunion because they will be too exhausted to do anything. the older people use their retirement to travel a lot or to take care of the children of their children. They have a lot of time to spend. In my second point, I will speak for those who think that young people enjoy it more than older people. They will argue that, when you are young you could do anything like going to a night club, spending your holidays with your friends or doing a lot of forbidden things. I will answer these people by underlining that older people have already done these things and the young do not know yet the pleasure of having a family : a wife who is in love and children. They do not know the pleasure of making a commitment during the wedding ceremony. My last point is that young people will have to deal with society problems that did not exist before, like terrorism. Indeed, our society becomes crazy. Relegion wars are very detrimental for the young future. They will have to find a solution to this issue if they do not want to live in a society ruled by fear and terror. In my opinion, only older people could help the younger to find the solution. Thanks to their life's experience they were able to find an issue. I will conclude my explanation by saying that older people enjoy life more than young people because with their age they have done everything and no young people can enjoy life more than an older person because they do not know yet what real life.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: When we predict the future, we can see fewer cars in use than there are today. Nowadays, we use cars the most of the time. When we go to school, go to the office, or go to the store, we take our cars with us; but the car is not the best way for transportation actually. There are many problems that come up when we take cars. First of all, there are limited resources to make cars move. As we can see in the newspapers, gasoline is running out. We can make a soloer power to make a car move, but we cannot ride a car when we do not have sunlight, such as in the winter season.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I really agree with this topic. When I see the advertisement, I become to want it or eat it or drink it. I have experience of it. When I was watching TV, I saw the commercial about "Taco-Bell". I had never eaten it. It seemed really good. Then after school, I asked my host mother to take me there because I seriously wanted to eat it. Then we went there. And I ordered it. I was very surprised when it came. It was just like my finger size. When I watched the commercial it was much bigger than in reality. And it was warm, not hot. I always become to want it when I see the advertisement. So I was glad it was not like a machine. Because it was not so expensive. Sometimes I really want to get something expensive when I see the advertisement. But I can stop feeling that I want it. I think because I missed Taco-Bell"'s meal. As we can see there are many advertisements in the world. I don't think it is good to make products seem much better than they really are. It is a kind of trickster. It is kind of illegal things! ! However if I became someone who was selling something, I would have the advertisement.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Depending on the circumstances to which the question could be posed, the answers vary accordingly. Of course, young adults have completely different sources of enjoyment to middle aged people who in turn, have different enjoyment to a pensioner. Depending on where you find a place in this chain will distinguish what you consider fun. A younger crowd will enjoy attending parties, attending night clubs, doing rather challenging and more physically tiring sports. A middle aged person might enjoy playing a game of chess or maybe going to the opera and for that middle aged person, attending noisy parties and doing dangerous sports might not be enjoyment at all. Therefore, depending on the age that you have, whatever you do will bring upon it the correct benefit. There is a typically trend that young people believe that they enjoy life more than an older person because they believe that the younger you are the more fun you can have, this i believe is incorrect because, yes of course, the younger you are the more options of enjoyment you might think you mighthave. For example, a father of a child would rather spend time with his son or daughter rather than attend a gathering full of 20-year-olds just because he has different priorities. A young person would not enjoy spending time with relatives or older members of his family simply because at that age, you tend to have different obligations, different points of interest and a different type of mentality. Younge rpeople tend to feel that as your age you miss out on what is really fun, but we must remember that older people were young at one point and what a young person thinks a older person will never dream of doing, might just probably mean that it was already done.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I disagree with the statement, because for me it is always necessary to take some risks and try new things to have success and not only when you know how to do well. In fact for me, if you don't try one thing, you don't try another thing because you don't have the experience that the precedent thing can giveyou. For example, if you don't try to use a bicycle, you don't learn to go with it, and after you don't learn to use a scooter, it is more difficult than using a bicycle. But if you learn to go over a bicycle, after you can also use a scooter ; so you can use both of them. The Experiences that you try to do, help you to endure your life. This is the main reason why i say that it is important to take risks and try new things and new adventures. And for me also the worst experiences are important because they also help you not to commit the same errors another time. In fact, for example, if you drive a lot before school, and after you have had an accident, you learn that you don't drink any alcohol before you drive for the next time.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement. Young people do enjoy their life morethan older people,young people have more energy and more adrenalin which boosts them to do whatever they want on the other hand, older people have less energy and enthusiasm, and their bodies are weak and so they have to think twice before they do anything. For example if a young man wants to go for a tour in his holidays then the first thing that comes to his mind is where to go, whom to take, when etc but when an old person considers a trip to go somewhere the first thing that comes to his mind is how long the journey will be and what all precautions he needs to take. young people can freely do whatever they want but older people may have many health problems which will restrict them from doing things which they would have liked to do. Young people can eat ,drink and do anything they like but older people will have many restrictions. When it comes to sports young people are encouraged to play many of them, whereas older people are always cautioned and even they are afraid to play to their full potential. Older people's mindsets are mainly different when compared to younger people like they look at life as a journey coming to an end mostly thinking about what they have achieved and feeling satisfied, whereas young people never think of their past they always plan their future, they view their life as a beginning of a great journey. For example older people think about their college days when they were young always thinking of funny things and their personal experiences and feeling satisfied.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I do not agree with this statement because I think it is impossible for us to live without cars. If it said there would be fewer cars in use than there are in fifty years, I think I might agree, though. The first reason I disagree with this is that in America, people can not go anywhere without using cars because they do not have good transportation systems as we do. Also, I do not think they can improve transportation systems such as trains because America has too large a continent so that it will not be easy to make railways all over the continents. I think this can be said in many countries. Next, cars are really useful in our lives. When somebody in your family gets sick late at night, you can drive to the hospital by yourself and it is much more comfortable for sick people to get around by car. If there will be fewer cars in use in the future, what will help our emergency trips? A robot? I do not think there will be new instruments invented in the next two decades.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Whether it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts ? When facing these questions, different people may have different opinions. In my opinion, understanding ideas and concepts is sometimes more important for students than learning facts. My reasons for this are as follows. Firstly, a lot of knowledge in our world is ideas and concepts of things. Sometimes it is difficult for us to reach the facts because the technology we've got today does not have the ability to do it. For example, when we study biology, there are many things about our human body that we can't explain how they work, such as the memorial system in our brain. We can only guess it according to the limited consequences. So most of the time we only have ideas and concepts about these things. Students who can understand the ideas and concepts can help them develop their ways of thinking and proceed with their research. Secondly, knowledge in some scientific areas is very abstract. It is very difficult or sometimes even impossible to learn the facts. The art, for instance needs us to feel. The ideas and concepts of an artistic work are the only thing we can use to understand it. They don't tell us the facts. In addition, understanding ideas and concepts helps us to possess the ability to use the knowledge. If a student only knows to follow the facts and never thinks about them, he or she probably doesn't know how to use it. Their minds will be stuck with no personal opinions and wide imaginations. To sum up, nowadays, the most important thing for a student I think iscreation.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The statement, 'successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" is telling us that, to succeed, you have to try new things and take risks rather than always doing the way you are really good at. I agree with the statement. I think it helps to make something you are not really good at and make it one of the things you are good at. It also makes you experience many things and experiences success, and sometimes fail. That teaches us what is right and what is wrong. In your life, you have to try many things. When you are a baby, you have to try to get up and walk. If you don't start with that kind of risk, you will never walk, and not be like a normal person. Taking risks might be something very difficult. It might also be very easy. When you try something, you can like it, or you can hate it. It's all your choice. for example, this term, it tried for all the sports teams in school. I thought I was really bad at basketball, but when I joined the team, I figured out that I really liked it, and was actually better than what I thought. Making my self made me have a new hubby and try to be better at it. Trying and taking risks helps you to learn what is right and what is wrong. When you try, you sometimes succeed, and sometimes fail. My dad told me that failing makes you succeed more and helps you learn what to do next to not failing at the same thing. For example, my brother really liked tennis even though he didn't do it. When he tried, he found out that he didn't like it at all. From then, he didn't do tennis, and found out that one of his hobbies wasn't really his hobby. In that case, he failed and also succeeded in what he tried. He failed at guessing what his hobby was, but he succeeded in finding out what his real hobby was. I think successful people always try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. It helps people to try and be good at something you tried. It also makes you learn what is right and what is wrong and makes you not make the mistake you did again when you do it again.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with this statement because (but I hope it will be true) there are a huge number of interests linked with the car industry and it will be improbably that in only twenty years something will change. First of all, I don't think that in a small time the technology will develop new kinds of movement systems and, more importantly, they will be secure for humans (like what happened in Germany with a new kind of train that was based on magnetic forces, a disaster, many people dead ). We must be sure!. Second, in my opinion, the owners of oil companies have invested a lot of money in industry that produces cars, so if these industries changed their standard of production, probably, a lot of them would close and a lot of people would be unemployed. Also if the oil runs  out , I am sure that all these rich people will find something else to maintain their control over the transportationorganization.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Are there differences in enjoyment in life compared with young people and those of whom are older at age? Well, I think that is a question that depends on the personality or different backgrounds in which the person came from. However, I do think that a younger person will have the advantage of enjoying and having fun in life because they have less to worry about. When a person becomes older they are more aware and warned of personal and social problems, at school, friendships , grades and so on. What I thought was the most difficult, while growing up to be a pre-teenager was that I had to conform with others and I had to use the right choice of words. When you are little you have limited thoughts of how your words may affect others and how you accept differences, but when you grow up, you may be discriminated against and discriminated against because of your skin color and the clothes you wear, or the way you look.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. However, others disagree. In my opinion, I think the former statement is true. This is because young people are energetic, brave, and courageous. Young people always have energy to do many things. For example, they will use their free time to hang out with their friends. They will go to some places to enjoy themselves as clubs, bars, and movie centers. Furthermore, young people are more attracted by the colourful world rather than staying at home. They are afraid of grounding because it is indispensable for them to have fun. In addition to being energetic, people who are young have the bold to enjoy their life.

They will go to some places to enjoy themselves as clubs, bars, and movie centers. Furthermore, young people are more attracted by the colourful world rather than staying at home. They are afraid of grounding because it is indispensable for them to have fun. In addition to being energetic, people who are young have the bold to enjoy their life. For instance, they try to do things which older people are afraid to do. Like ferry wheels. Moreover, they will not bother how much money they have left. Instead, they will have a great time spending the money to find their dream beautiful life. Finally, young people can endure the challenges. An example is, they will challenge new stuff to know the right way to enjoy life even including doing drugs. On the other hand, older people prefer a peaceful life. It is clear that I agree with the statement because young people have energetic spirits both physically and mentally. Therefore, they will not feel tired by having fun in their lives. Also, they are never afraid to pursue their happiness in their lives. Lastly, they are the people who can be challenged to enjoy life.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I have experienced both travel in a group led by a tour guide and travel by myself. Some people think that travelling in groups with a tour guide is better than travelling without a tour guide. While, others have the opposite idea. I agree with the following statement that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. Because this is the safest way and an enjoyable way to travel. The first reason that I agree with this statement is because we all want to have a safe trip. It is ridiculous that you do not really understand the cultures or lessons where you travel.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: A number of people have argued that young people nowadays do not give enough time to help their communities. While the first reaction of some people may disagree with this statement, there are some compelling reasons to explore this issue in more depth. Concerning the status quo of today's society, I personally agree with this statement for the following two reasons. First, the atmosphere of competition is getting stronger in many fields, such as career or study. People treat educational degrees with more seriousness, and consequently, people are required to pursue higher degrees than in previous times. Nowadays, parents are aware of this change in society. As a result, they expect their children to pay exclusive attention to their studies, or specifically, to everything which is helpful to their education. Helping the communities simply turns into a waste-of-time behavior if it is not beneficial to the studies. In addition, the security problems also reduce people's willingness to help the communities. There are more crimes or robbery acts happening in the dark corner of the street all the time. Parents are worried about the children's safety, and as a consequence fewer and fewer parents or adults will encourage their children to hang out outside as long as the neighbourhood is alive with a signal of unsafty. there is one true example that happened to my mom. Last year she just walked home after work, she unfortunately robbed by a young man. Her bags were gone as well as some amount of money. My mother was terrifying, and she started warning me that I had to come home no later then six o'clockon any circumstances , and tried my best not to hang around the community because it was very dangerous.
