title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: It is commonly known that young people do enjoy life more than older people do. That is, in other words, age can sometimes be a hindrance towards living life to its fullest, and of course enjoying it to very far extents and dimensions. Nevertheless, i personally do not support and agree with this statement simply because the modern society lifestyle is not tied to age, old people do have more experience in life than younger people, and the spirit never gets old even though the body does. As a matter of fact, modern societies and modern lifestyles do not impose any age considerations as far as their activities are concerned. That is to say, old people can always do what is done by young people without being under the spotlight and focus, and no one finds it strange and odd when he finds them doing such activities. As an example, an old person can go and have a concert with his girl friend or wife till down without being someone exceptional. So, our open society leaves all doors open in the face of all people, whatever their age is. Secondly, I do think that old people ` s experiences in life do back them up in enjoying their life to its fullest in the sense that it allows them to have a good knowledge of how life can be lived and enjoyed more than young people. The difference between young and old people would be quite obvious if a comparison of how both parts enjoy their holidays is to be made. Thirdly, I do believe that human bodies do get old under the influence of time.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: It is more important for students to learn facts than to understand ideas and concepts. We need to first learn facts in order to get ideas and concepts. What would happen if one gets ideas or concepts without knowing the facts? I think it will lead to the misconception of the people whom one doesn't know. Without knowing the facts, we are not able to know the truth. For example, if one sees black people ,without knowing the facts, if one follows the common ideas and concepts of the black people, one might think most of the black people are uneducated and theifs. Or, if one sees Mexicans working on the construction site, one might think that they are all poor and uneducated. Or one might think all Asians are good at math or science, and they are all excellent in their schools. These are all misconceptions. People who don't know the facts could misunderstand the people around them. If one knows the facts first before understanding the concepts or ideas of the people, one can't just automatically put people in a certain category like that. Even though the person is working on the construction site, I know there are many people who are well educated and not poor. They just choose to work there. I know Asians who are not good at either math nor science.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The most fearful thing that people think of is death. Then, some people may say that young people have a lot of time to live compared to older people, therefore they can enjoy life more. It is sure that older people have a high possibility of death for various reasons, such as disease and weakness of their body. However, when death comes, it is unknown. Probably, a baby which was just born one hour ago may have died because of the sudden accident. Therefore I disagree with the statement which is "Young people enjoy life more than older people do. "First, each person has a different situation and environment. These situations and environments have a great impact on a person's life. For example a lot of children die because of disease or lack of food in developing countries. Their lives are quite hard. They do not know if they can live tomorrow or not, because they do not have any money and food. They also have to work for their family at a young age, and sometimes, they sell their organs to get money. Young people are healthier than older people, therefore they have to earn money. Probably, most young people in these situations can not enjoy their life. Therefore it is not true that all young people enjoy life and are able to spend all their time on themselves. Second, older people in developed countries may have a lot of free time which they can use for their own. For example, in Japan, a lot of older people can get money from the government after the decided age. Therefore they do not have to work, and they use this free period to do their hobbies, such as sports, music, games. and so on. It is not true that all old people enjoy their lives, but it is true that a lot of old people enjoy their lives by arranging their future.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. If the advertisements fail to show the products' virtue, why do the manufacturers advertise their products every day? It is the basic function of the advertisement. Commercials are trying to exaggerate the virtue of products in two ways. First, using the characteristics of media. Television, newspapers, and magazines are adapting every possible visual effects in their advertisements in order to show the products brighter than they are. They use lighting and computer based image reprocessing techniques. There are lots of new techniques used in the advertisements that make it possible products can be seen as totally different styles and shapes.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Nobody can define what life is and what enjoyment is. Life and enjoyment both have different meanings for different individuals. A person may enjoy their whole life. But it is not possible to avoid the pains and sorrows from life, because these are part of everybody's life and come at different ages. Some pains are related to age, like physical problems. Some people face age problems early in their life and some people face problems late in life. Or we can say that some people become senile early, it depends on the situation which they faced in their life and it also depends on genetic factors also. I agree with this statement that " Young people enjoy life more than older people do". One reason to support this opinion is that undoubtedly the young person's energy level is higher than the older one's. Young people are more enthusiastic than older people and enthusiasm is a must to enjoy life. Older people's energy will decrease as their age will increase, this is a basic bilogical principle. A young person can travel and go wherever they want to go but it is not possible for an old age person because their body will not allow them to do so. Another reason is that the physical problems will restrict old people's activities, like they can't travel so frequently if they have a problem with jointpain. They can't eat what they want to eat most because their medical prescriptions will not allow them to do so. Old people can't take so much sugar in their food if they have the problem of diabetes. But a young person can easily eat what they want and they can easily digest it. They have no restrictions on their food. And taking food of our preference is also a joy of life or we can say enjoyment. A young person has no physical problems no joint problems so they can travel and go to adventures sites.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Yes most and many advertisements make products much better than they really are. I believe in making advertisements it is what a company does to make money, to have success. There are many sports shoe companies out on the market right now, but do you really think a pair of Nike shoes costs $ 110. But if you look into it, why do pairs of shoes coast so much, because it is an advertisement that Nike makes their shoes look better than everyone else's. At the end of each day, what the company really wants, they want to have success, they want to be on the top, that want to make money and they will do what ever they can to get to the top. Yes, I agree that most advertisements make products seen much better than they really are. A pair of Nike shoes doesn't really cost $ 110, they cost something like $ 5 to $ 10. On top of all the taxes, import, export. It comes out somewhere around $ 80. And then, the business wants to make money, so they add another $ 30 to it, it comes out to $ 110. What kind of advertisements Nike use there. They make the shoes very expensive, it makes the shoes look long-lasting, better, or can make you jump faster or jump further. The price convenience you is a pair of good shoes.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Some people may think that successful people always try new things and take risks. Others may think that those people will only focus on what they already know how to do well. I believe that successful people will only do what they are already skilled at. It is because they know the reason why they are successful is because no one can replace their specialities. Moreover, doing what they are skilled at can prevent them from being lost. That a person has a job that no one can replace his or her position is a very important factor for a successful person. My father always told me that I have to find my interests, and become very skilled in that field. I totally believe those words because a successful person knows his interests and keeps studying them until he knows a lot about his interests. Take my professor for example, she is very good at translation. Thus, when some of the faculty members want to translate their books into English, they all ask my professor for help. They won't think about others. My professor can earn a lot of money by doing translation. Therefore, successful people will only do what they already know how to do because they know no one can replace them. Moreover, a successful person is successful because he does anything to prevent himself from being failed. Can a successful person still succeed when he is failed? I don't think so. For example, there was once a well-known company in my country. They were famous because they could produce nicely-looking computers. Every body liked to use their computer.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I agree with the statement as it says, the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. There are three advantages. First, as you travel in a group led by a tour guide, the tour guide will let you know every single thing you need to see on the journey. For example, if you want to go sightseeing, a tour guide will escort you to the sight. The tour guide will be responsible for whatever traveler wants to do. They just don' t have to worry about reserving a restaurant or doing some special activities. Especially when they cannot speak English or German or whatever the languages are spoken in the country where they travel to. Second, since going travelling with a group, they will definitely get along with each other and have fun. If traveling alone, you won't be able to have much fun as traveling with a group. Third, traveling on a gourp with a tour guide is much safer than traveling alone. Of course a tour guide knows about the location where it is not safe enough to go so they won't go to the dangerous side of the city. Ever since transportation has developed amagingly, the world is getting closer. We can go to another side of the world by airplane in ten hours or it may take a day to get there. It used to take about two, three months to get to other countries. The world is getting more dangerous, most people have guns and knives. so traveling with a tour guide is very helpful for the traveler. In my experiences, I have been to Australia on my own. It was still scary to go there by myself. Especially in the town centre. When I went to town, I lost my wallet. i didn't lose my passport, though.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with the following statement that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. When a person wants to learn the facts first he has to have some ideas about how he can come to the end point. first of all he has to make clear about the concepts he wants to include to achieve that destiny. For example, if we want to do some project to submit to a professor we have to have some dead time to finish,then we have to concentrate on how we can finish that assignment on time. first we have to create some ideas like which books we have to refer to,how we can present that paper,the order of the paper,we have to show to someone who can give us some more information that can be included,put the paper in a clear format and submit the paper. Factual information may be the true information to learn that before we have to understand what the hidden ideas and the concepts are. when we are in a family everyperson tries to reach a conclusion so easily about others but before coming to a conclusion about that person we have to have some idea about his behaviour that is how he talks,how he moves,how he behaves in the house,then we have to make a concept about that person then finally give the facts about that person. I conclude my passage by saying that every person,for example a student should create an idea about which graduation he wants to complete and what courses he is interested in and prepare a concept of what is required for him to complete the graduation. take some suggestions ,know how difficult it is and then enter in to the fact that he wants to end up with that certificate of graduation in which he is interested in joy.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I certainly dont agree with the statement "Young people enjoy life more than older people do". If a person wants to enjoy his/her life they can enjoy it no matter how old they are. Enjoying life doesnt depend on how old a person is, however; it depends on how the person is. being sociable, appreciating what you have, and having a positive way of thinking are all characteristics a person contains but it differs in people, what kind of person they are. Being a sociable person has a major affect on a person. If a person dislikes being around people then he / she wont be able to enjoy life because he/she is not seeing people from different cultures that entertain you. This unsociable person would end up being alone not wanting to interact with the outside world. One of the major reasons that would make a person enjoy his life is appreciating what he/she has. If a person does not do so he wouldn't be living that of a nice life. For example: If a poor girl is friends with a rich girl and this poor girl wants to wear and have what the rich girl has, that is a big problem because the girl would not be able to afford certain things. By not appreciating what she has she would suffer alot and wouldn't really enjoy life. If a person wants to really enjoy life he/she would no matter who he/she really was.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are the most used form of transport known nowadays will that change in twenty years? it is very hard to answer. In developed countries nearly everyone over a certain age has a car, alot of people use it on a daily basis: to go to work, shopping, travelling and in theirleisure time. I use the car everyday and i cannot imagine life with out it and because of that i think that there will be more cars rather than fewer in twenty years. You can argue that: Petrol is running out!. Everyone knows that, everyone is aware yet not many know what is going to happen with its price. In twenty years i believe that prices are going to increase, fewer people are going to be able to pay that price, people on shorter incomes will have to use other ways to get around and therefore the number of cars will be expected to decrease because people wont be able to pay the price but the problem is that there are other fuels that can be used and people will get used to having cars which are slower and less comfortable.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: "young people enjoy life more than older people do" , agree or disagree? what a difficult question. Thinking of the answers puts you in a closed circle, there is no definite one. "Enjoying life" is not dependent only on the factor of age, despite the fact that we say that "inorder to enjoy life you have to feel young from inside", for my opinion age is one of the least essential effects. To approve of this statement or not, first we have to clarify what the interpretation of "enjoy life" is. I think that we all agree that it differs from one individual to the other, depending on their characters, their goals in life, their aspects, opinions. etc.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: These days, many technology systems are developed. For example, we could play in many ways these days like playing an X-box in their houses and going to the movie theatre. On the other hand, old people might not have a chance to play or watch the movie at the theatre with their friends. Not only playing to enjoy life, we could also find our new jobs easily and find their habits easily through the internet explorer. First of all, many young people these days play X-box in their house. Probably in the old days, they just played outside of sports like basketball or soccer. However, these days, we can play soccer or basketball in our house using an X-box. The new technology systems affect us in many ways. For example, we are allowed to talk to someone anywhere and at any time we want. By calling or e-mailing each other, we could find an enjoyable life. In addition, many young people these days also go to the movie theatre to watch the movies. In the movie theatre, we could choose the movie we want to watch. For instance, scary movies and sad movies. By watching them we could have a fun time in our spare time. Also while we watch the movie we can also eat any foods we want. In the old days, they didn't have any movies, so probably they all watched the news all the time. Finally, we could find our habits and new jobs easily by searching on the internet explorer. For example, we are interested in skiing in the winter break, then we could search for a place where we could go for the best and we could even learn how to do the ski. By searching and finding out from the internet explorer, we could find out what habits are. For instance, when I started to chat with my neighbor and I enjoy it, then it could become my habit. In conclusion, many technology systems affect a more enjoyable life than older people did before their life.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Life is not merely breathing but experiencing the new adventures that every day brings. Energy and desire are the two main components young people experience when accomplishing their short or long term goals which keep them happier than grown-ups. Despite the common thought about retirement to enjoy life, recent studies show that 99% of old people do not enjoy life like younger people. The first group have got what they were looking for in their lives: a family , a beautiful house, enough money in the bank, among other things. Besides, it is a shame that getting the retirement they do not have time to travel to, to be attentive to some interesting things just because of health problems. They have to go and come to the doctor's surgery, spending their money on paying refills for their medical prescriptions. By contrast, younger people have energy , desire and many new goals to accomplish. Even though they seem to be very busy they are really happy because every day brings something exceptional to their lives and it has to do with their happiness. In conclusion, being younger means having energy , desire to achieve long term, short term goals which makes you enjoy life, more than older people. To experience new things every day, that gives happiness and relief. Definitely it is more exciting than being old and having just retired and stopping doing great and exciting things just because you have got old and you have already accomplished the mission you are here for.

The first group have got what they were looking for in their lives: a family , a beautiful house, enough money in the bank, among other things. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In the world, we can see many advertisements appearing on the television, in magazines, on the radio, and in newspapers. When people see the advertisements on the TV, in magazines, on the radio or in the newspaper, we can see the color is more beautiful than the product is. Also it can let many people know about the product and to buy it , but people don't know whether the product is good or bad. First of all, it can make products more beautiful than before, but this is not the true color, it can make people make mistakes about the color. If i saw clothes on the TV, maybe sometimes i feel happy that the color is very nice. I know, some workers use light or a computer to make it. we can choose the best color and let it appear on TV. So, the first thing is to make the color more beautiful. Second , i think it can make something better than the product really is. For example, we usually see a second hand car on the TV and buy it. If people see the car just on the computer or TV. We can't buy that. Some cars are a lemon. We need to go to the place and try to drive it. You can know whether a car is good or bad only through experiment. So, advertisements make cars much better than they really are. The third reason is that it can let many people know and buy it. Some drinks or food made advertisements, we saw the drinks and food were delicious, but the company didn't say how much fat they contained. Some food is not helpful for people's health. The company's purpose is to get many people to buy the products. So, they just say good things about people. Finally, i say i agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. I hope people who want to buy something go to that place and make sure that things are what you want to buy.
sents: ["In the world, we can see many advertisements appearing on the television, in magazines, on the radio, and in newspapers. When people see the advertisements on the TV, in magazines, on the radio or in the newspaper, we can see the color is more beautiful than the product is. Also it can let many people know about the product and to buy it , but people don't know whether the product is good or bad. First of all, it can make products more beautiful than before, but this is not the true color, it can make people make mistakes about the color. If i saw clothes on the TV, maybe sometimes i feel happy that the color is very nice. I know, some workers use light or a computer to make it. we can choose the best color and let it appear on TV. So, the first thing is to make the color more beautiful. Second , i think it can make something better than the product really is. For example, we usually see a second hand car on the TV and buy it. If people see the car just on the computer or TV. We can't buy that. Some cars are a lemon. We need to go to the place and try to drive it. You can know whether a car is good or bad only through experiment. So, advertisements make cars much better than they really are. The third reason is that it can let many people know and buy it. Some drinks or food made advertisements, we saw the drinks and food were delicious, but the company didn't say how much fat they contained. Some food is not helpful for people's health. The company's purpose is to get many people to buy the products. So, they just say good things about people. Finally, i say i agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.", 'I hope people who want to buy something go to that place and make sure that things are what you want to buy.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In my opinion,according to the statistics in the past decade immigration to the big cities from suburban areas is rapidly growing. I think that cars have become more popular released with this city lifestyle. Meanwhile number of big metropolitians is increasing year by year. I would like to draw attention to the reasons for immigration such as the huge potential of unemployment,not enough support for agriculture and farmers,a huge gap between urban and suburban areas' education system across the country. So in big cities personnel cars have become a requirement for those people. As i mentioned before living in a big city forces you to have a car to do everything you want in this lifestyle. Besides it also accounts for traffic jams and big crowds in cities that make people unable to live in. On the other hand there are different kinds of public transportation. In developed countries we can perceive widespread usage of public transportation. But if we look at the developing countries personal car usage is higher because of insufficent public transport systems. For example, Istanbul is the biggest city in Turkey ; since last year i have not driven to work because there is always an enormous traffic jam on highways Do you think it would probably change? No i do not think so.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: i do agree with the statement. in today's fast moving world everybody wants to step ahead. everybody wants success and to make progress. young people are so busy with their studies that they forget their responsibility towards their community. They are so busy studying that they have no time leftover for extra activities. they were our parents and grandparents who used to do this job perfectly. if not, young people are busy with their college, classes, homework and everything. and if they are not busy with their friends, movies, partners,or just freeking out and having fun and enjoying their days, forgetting about their duty towards their community. this is something called GENERATION GAP. they are now no longer interested in doing such social work. they find it boring and a waste of time. we should all take some measures towards it to try to explain to the young generation that helping our community is so very important. we should offer a helping hand and do something beneficial for them. we should not only help our community but also our friends family and all who need us who needour help.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: In my opinion, the best way to travel is in a group and with a tour guide, because when you travel with more people it is more fun and especially if you are leading by a tourist guide, he will know the best places to visit. If you go to visit another country is important to be guided by a tourist guide, because usually you will not know anything about this place, or country. He will know the most popular places and the way to get to them. If you go to another country , the people from this country maybe speak another language, in this case it is going to be difficult to find the places you would like to go especially if you get lost. There is when the tourist guide will be helpful, he will know the language of the country making things easier for the group. Another reason is that tourist guides know a large amount of history, in this way when you are visiting museums for example the tourist guide will tell you all the important details of the history of the place you are visiting, making the trip more.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Learning about things different from thing s isthe basis of our society. Because if everyone specialized themselves in one subject only one academic subject would be difficult for us to discuss together in general subjects. In our society there are continuing changes, we need specialized people who can well understand topics in their favourite academic subjects. Nobody can understand all problems in all subjects and find solutions for those problems, we need experts for that. For example we are not able to explain how the financial policy of a multinational can affect the company'sprofits. But the people who are able to explain that, maybe not able to explain how education can reduce violence in poor countries. These experts are, I think, the ones able to teach their knowledge. It's important that this knowledge doesn't begin as a sort of integrism. Even if we are specialized in a subject it's important to understand other people's point of view. The fact that our society is in a permanent changing put an other problem on the table. What happened to people specializing on a topic that became old fashioned? Do these people have lost all their skills? What can they do now? The key is that people should be able to work, learn and think about other subjects.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Mankind always needs success to reach good life standards therefore success is a very important aspect of humanlife. Everybody has different points of view about the idea of success. Some assume that, successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well, contrary to some think that successful people should only do what they already know how to do well rather than try new things and take risks. I personally agree with the first idea. These are the following reasons. Firstly, people should find their best way. Everybody who contains also successful people always tries new things. Their solutions are good or bad. Therefore, people find a way which is the best way for our life. For example, my father is a business man and he is very successful. Furthermore, he is always always interested in sport and he decided to buy a company about sport so he took a risk. However, now he is more successful than last. In addition to this, taking risks is amazing. I like taking risks so much because I believe that surprising solutions make life more enjoyable and enjoyable.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: As far as I am concerned, the best way to travel is a free tour. In other words, I think not planned tours will give us a more pleasant experience. You may argue that the group tour led by an adept tour guide can show us more things to see and feel, but it is just a second-hand experience just given away to our hand by another person. In my case, I am planning a New york tour in two weeks. I've saved my spare pocket money and earned money from part time jobs for two years. I prepared sightseeing visa and flight tickets just on my own without any help from a tour agency. It gave me self-confidence that I can do anything for myself. It was a little bit hard work to prepare documents for applying for a visa and the cheapest flight ticket, but I think it was a reserved thing to do. You can save time by preparing your travel with an agency and a skillful guide, but you cannot get the experience of doing something on your own. Moreover, self planned travel can give you a great experience different from a group tour, which has to obey a timetable scheduled by a tour agency or guide. People who go on a trip with a guide can see famous tourist attractions and get the same memories as others, but tourists without a guide will go anywhere they want to go even if it was not a planned thing to do. A plan-less trip can give us real freedom because no plan is our plan. I think Many tourists commit oblivion to get freedom.

A plan-less trip can give us real freedom because no plan is our plan.", 'I think Many tourists commit oblivion to get freedom.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The distinct difference between young people and older people does not exist and to make this distinction is difficult. Also, deciding which is more enjoyable is a more complex issue. Young people are more energetic and full of dreams, while older people are at ease and satisfied, although such differences depend on the situations of their abilities and lives. I will take the position that older people enjoy life more than younger people, and discuss it below. The most important characteristics of older people are money and time. Most successful people have a lot of money and a lot of time in their everyday lives. Even younger people such as famous entrepreneurs are wealthy but they must be busy and have a rare time to enjoy their time leisurely.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Technology has been improved so much in the past decades, solving all sorts of problems that we had, and still keep developing. Even though technology is fast improving, there are major problems remaining which are the increase in cars that pollute our environment. I cast doubt on the claim that twenty years is too short a time to solve the problem. First, the speed of development in technology is unbelievably fast. No one thought that they could talk to each other and see each other at the same time with the wireless phone. However, with technology so far, we will only be able to create other cars such as flying cars or cars that can go under the water. This could not be the solution as the number of cars will be the same as now or even more. It would be a great improvement but would not help the problem of pollution caused by cars. Secondly, in the last twenty years there has been a dramatic difference in transfer matters, I believe that twenty years is too short a time to think about whether the number of cars will decrease. I strongly believe that one day it will; however with the technology we have at the moment, we can not solve this problem. In conclusion, we are having pollution problems because of an increasing number of cars such as air pollution and nose pollution.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Education is more and more important to everyone in the world now, but different people have different points of views on what is more important for students. Some people think that understanding ideas is more important, but there is also a group of people who think that it shouldn't be like that, Learning facts is more important than understanding ideas.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I agree with the statement that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. First, according to the improvement of public transportation such as, train, bus and so forth, it would not be necessary to have a car privately. The city I live in has various kinds of public transportation, such as buses, tubes, trains. I do not feel any need to have cars. It is true there are lots of cities that do not have the infrastructure of public transportation adequately in quality and quantity. But according to the improvement of public transportation in twenty years, the need for owning cars will be decreased. Some people may want to have a car for their joy despite the improvement of public transportation. However considering the item I discuss in the succeedingparagraph, people who think they want to have cars for their joys will change their minds. Second, we have to take advantage of natural resources more and more effectively in the future. In that sense, we should not use and own cars privately. The decrease in natural resources including crude oils has been and will have been a.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. First of all, there are many active, fresh, lively older people. They have many hobbies, friends, family, so they are enjoying their life. Some older people look so young! My grandfather is also one of these people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I both agree and disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people do, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience. Young people can enjoy their lives by exploring the outside world and trying many new things. We young people enjoy our life differently than older people do. Young people have to use the advantage of energy to explore more or we will regret it when we are old. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. After getting old, they will have merry lives if they persist in being healthy. Elders do not need to do anything for their lives, they can sleep late, read newspapers, watch TV, play golf, spend time with their grandchildren and do everything they expect to do during their free time. Older people can enjoy their lives by having a lot of free time.
sents: ['I both agree and disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people do, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience. Young people can enjoy their lives by exploring the outside world and trying many new things. We young people enjoy our life differently than older people do. Young people have to use the advantage of energy to explore more or we will regret it when we are old. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. After getting old, they will have merry lives if they persist in being healthy. Elders do not need to do anything for their lives, they can sleep late, read newspapers, watch TV, play golf, spend time with their grandchildren and do everything they expect to do during their free time.', 'Older people can enjoy their lives by having a lot of free time.']

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. An advertisement can use all of the five physical human senses, but the advertisements people normally experience are visual and auditory. The simplest and the most common form of advertisement is the visual form, such as advertisements in magazines, newspapers, and the ones on billboards. When concentrating on the visual effect, the advertisement needs an aesthetic, or visual impact which could grab a potential customer by a glance, or a message motivating the reader to buy the product. The advertisement may appeal to the reader by highlighting the efficiency, advantage, uniqueness of the product. However, for every advertisement, the quintessential motto is : buy me. In order to attract the reader, an advertisement at times uses the effects of eye-grasping exaggeration. With such aesthetically alluring visual pictures -with the help of modern technology, photography, or literature , an advertisement nearly blinds the reader depending on the reader's class, culture, or sex.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In my opinion it is more important for students to understand concepts than to study or learn the facts pertaining to the subjects. I have experienced a lot of problems with this matter in my childhood days when i usually concentrated more on the facts than ideas and concepts. One such experience occurred in my tenth class where i usually learn facts about my subjects such as physics,social studies,mathematics before exams.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: When we look from the past to nowadays, we will discover a lot of successful people. These people have mostly spent a lot of time trying new stuff and experiencing new things,and that is why these people can succeed. Therefore, a lot of the time, it is true that successful people are those who try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. People who try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well often succeed. These people often work really hard to find new stuff and new ideas. People who want to succeed often need to take risks in order to succeed. Although they might not end up living with good respect or beliefs from other people, their successes are undoubtable. For instance, one of the famous scientists who had exclaimed that the earth is round ended up in jail for a while, but his successful career is now no doubt that his theory was right. Therefore, people who are able to try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know what to do well often succeed. On the other hand, people who do not try new things and take risks but only doing what they already know how to do well do not often succeed. If a person does not try new things and discovers new things, one will only be a professional in one's field. Meanwhile, that person would be a really tiny chance to find new things like those who succeed. For example, if a smart student is good at science but he does not try to find any new thing in science, he might only be a good teacher or professor in his field, but instead of being a successful person who finds new things.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Most advertisements make products for many reasons. They want to sell their products to earn their money and many people have the experience that when you buy something home and realize that it is not useful, it is just like what appeared in an advertisement. I agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. The purpose of advertisements is to make their products to be bought. They want to sell their products. Therefore, they need to urge customers to buy. They will use everything to urge you to buy their products. Although it looks not good to eat, advertisements will use the pictures or sounds to make it look delicious. Then, advertisements use people's desire to sell their product. For example, an advertisement in which a hot model holds a diet drink will make many women buy it, because they want to be a hot model. But, in fact, you can't just drink a diet beverage and become the hot model. Advertisements use that idea to sell their products although diet drinks are not really working that way. Finally, advertisements only show the merits of products. Advertisers want to sell their products, so they exploit the fallacy of a product.

They want to sell their products to earn their money and many people have the experience that when you buy something home and realize that it is not useful, it is just like what appeared in an advertisement. I agree that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. The purpose of advertisements is to make their products to be bought. They want to sell their products. Therefore, they need to urge customers to buy. They will use everything to urge you to buy their products. Although it looks not good to eat, advertisements will use the pictures or sounds to make it look delicious. Then, advertisements use people's desire to sell their product. But, in fact, you can't just drink a diet beverage and become the hot model. Advertisements use that idea to sell their products although diet drinks are not really working that way. Finally, advertisements only show the merits of products.", 'Advertisers want to sell their products, so they exploit the fallacy of a product.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I don't believe there will be fewer cars in the next twenty years. Cars are the most efficient means of transportation because they's cheap, fast enough and we use them for our daily life. I guess no body can live without using the car in his daily transportation. Although the market for cars has grown much more than before, we can see more luxury , economical and comfortable cars. Although scientists are looking for another way to treat the car rather than oil. They are now having their experiment on sun power and Hydrojen and a lot of these experiments have been successful. Besides, the oil market is growing as well and there are a lot of reservations for oil for the next 40 and 60 years. Cars are important in our daily life , we use them to go to work , travel, construction and entertainment as well. I believe that cars will be different from now maybe flying cars or diving cars, and maybe we will use our car to travel in the air instead of airplanes and no need to bother ourselves about finding a reservation and the crowds of people at the airport. Also, we can see the number of cars is growing each year in the global world by millions. Companies, industries and businesses use cars to achieve their work. About me i use the car daily and i can't live without it. i use it to go to college and for travelling. Finally, I would say cars will be much more in the next twenty years and will grow rapidly as well as technology will grow much more and it will be more crowded on the ground and in the air and by the end of the century we will see cars work by solar power and hydroelectric.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement "Young people enjoy life more than older people do". Youth is the age when people have fresh blood with more innovations and ideas accompanied with an easy nature to face the hurdles and make them the most joyous situations. They enjoy the life of that short period with everything they can afford. The people falling under teenage are the people we see enjoying themselves most leaving about all the risks and pains they are facing in their roots of life. They enjoy life in many ways they are gifted with for example they may go with friends to parties and discos or for movies to get out of their busy life schedule,all these entertainments are growing rapidly with the competition of today's world keeping in mind the people'srequirements. Young people are the people who have got efficient energy to perform their talent by enjoying themselves,for example, dancing can be done only with these people and in contrast, old people cannot dance as they have not got sufficient energy with them.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN YOUNG AND OLD PEOPLE I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Because young people have more aims,plans or work for the future and they have enough time for doing these things. The young people are more ambitious than older people are. When they begin to do some work they want to finish it but older people can give up easily. They can live without doing anything,they can sit or they can listen to oldies. But young people can not live without doing nothing,they always want to produce something,they want to progress. I think young people do not want to sit like old people. The young people are so energetic but the old people are so lazy because the performance of their bodies is low and because of this they can not do the things that make them tired. The young people have got special abilities because the performance of their bodies is high. They can play football,they can swim,they can run fast but old people can not do these because of their low body performance. The young people like to watch the TV but the old people prefer to listen to music on the radio. There are many different programmes,magazines,films or competitions on TV but on the radio there are only songs and talkings. With this example i can say that young people enjoy life more than older people do. The old people want to sleep but the young people do not like it and want to sleep because the young people have so many things to do.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: From my point of view, this statement is not to support. There are some significant reasons to reduce the use of cars, for instance the environmental costs through pollution, the expenses in general for the car owner likefuel etc. But I strongly believe, that even if the natural resources are running out and the prices of fuel will continue to rise, and even if we pollute the air and do not do ourselves a favour, I believe that mankind will not use cars less, as long there are any cars available. And this opinion has many reasons. The people today do not often care about the world tomorrow, they just live in the presence, in the time of comfort and waste. People want to be independant, they do not want to wait somewhere at the busstation, being ruled by a scheduled arrival and departure. Using the car is often the most comfortable and fastest way to get somewhere, especially to a workplace. Often it saves time taking the car rather than for example the train. Nowadays we are too individualistic, we also want to have our own private space, and often prefer to drive somewhere just by ourselves quietly and relaxed, than having chatting people around us that could disturb our peaceful moment in the car. Having and using a car also has many practical reasons. If you go somewhere for shopping for example, your car is able to store a lot, you do not have to carry heavy bags around. Especially for a family, having cars is an enormous importance. It is more pleasant for a mother to have your children close by you in your car, than using public transport , which would only cause stress and bring your children into danger.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Have you ever bought any items that you didn't have a serious need to use? If you have experienced this case, It is because of a drastic advertisement. People who live in the modern world are members of capitalist societies. An advertisement has the role of making consumers buy its product. So, I think that advertisements usually make people overestimate the prices of products. It is because of the purpose of advertisements, the models of advertisements, and the indirect features of advertisements. First of all, I think the purpose of advertisements is the important reason to make people misjudge products. The roles of advertisements are to urge consumers to buy everything the companies sell. In order to fulfill their goals, companies are going to do whatever they can do. Therefore, most companies merely want to emphasize the good aspects of their products. As a result, products look better than they practically are. Secondly, I believe that the models of advertisements make products look much better. Usually, most advertisements tend to hire famous stars, sports players, and any super stars as their models. People can believe whatever super stars say in advertisements because superstars start so famous that people regard them as reliable humans.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Schools that teach k-12 students require students to study various subjects. These subjects that the students learn are not necessarily useful in their career. I believe that it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. If it is better to master one specific subject, why do the schools teach numerous subjects to the students? A student might agree that the subjects that they are learning in school are useless and meaningless to learn. This is not true because as you grow more mature you will realize that the thing you learned in school really comes to help in real life. So it is better to study and have knowledge of various types of subjects rather than having unlimited knowledge on one subject. It may seem better to specialize in one specific subject when you get a specific job that requires those knowledges you learned. Well, this is just in your carrier. When you get out into the social world, the things you learned are too professional that no one, but you and people who work with them understand. If you want to get involved in social life and understand life better, it is better to know many things. For example, when you go to a party where all kinds of different people gather. You want to talk to people, but you only know that specific topic and do not know other topics that people talk about. As a result, you will be secluded and feel alone. In conclusion, it is better to have broad knowledge of many subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. With broad, but a lot of knowledge you will enjoy a better life where you are not left behind, and you will be able to appreciate other people's opinionsmore.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In the modern world that we know, a lot of different products are available. Are we always aware carefully about all those products? Should it be the responsibility of companies to make sure customers know everything about risks that could be created by using their products? In fact, the law wants all risk concerning a product to be identified by the producer. Some believe that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Personally, I don't agree with this. Those advertisements make you think twice, and at least, they make sure the customer is aware of risks. First, Those advertisements make you think twice before buying a product like alcohol are tabaco.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: People have different opinions on whether having general knowledge of many academic subjects is better than specializing in one specific subject. people who disagree with the statement argue that specific knowledge is useful to get better jobs. However, I agree with the topic for two reasons : capability and social relationships. I will explain these reasons in detail. To begin with, broad knowledge is a capability which has one of the factors in modern society. Nowadays society wants people who have diverse abilities. Also, many universities offer various curriculums to students. For example, my sister has many abilities, such as English ability and resources of economy, policy and art. So when she meets people, almost all people like my sister. One day, she went to the bank to exchange his dollars. Hence, she saw some foreigner. So she asked for something to happen and the man answered that he did not find their company, Therefore, she talked to him and resolved the problem, After that, she got some requests to get a job. This means that ability is useful for living in society. Second, it is good for sustaining social relationships. People want to make relationships with brilliant people. Moreover, they need to obtain a good qualification to get  a job. Besides, many private institutes to learn creat in our society. Among them, language courses are a good example. At my University, Kookmin University, there are many courses in language such as Chinese, Japanese and English. Consequently, many people concentrate on the course. Therefore, the courses are finished enrolling. Also, my university offers a conversation course for students. It means that it is useful for students. In conclusion, I support that information about many academic subjects is better than information about professional subjects for the following reasons. First, it is an ability which modern people should have. Second, it is eligible for keeping social relationships.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: One of the famous social institutions amnesty international has more members than ever before and the interesting thing about their members is that they are more young people than adults which seems to negate the common sense that young people are egoists and prefer to do more for themselves than for other people. The important and connecting fact in this diverse thesis is that there are more young people who are social engaged, usually work for different organisations, but also try to look for their own interests and career. There are a lot of pupils and students who work during their free time for non-profit institutions like places where homeless people can find food, clothes or a place to stay during the cold season. And also there are many students who choose their subjects at university in social areas like medicine or law to help other people. But the important distinct of now and the past is that young people do not go to demonstrations or show their political understanding in society like their parents twenty years ago. The young adults combine their modern life with their own car and expensive clothes with social engagement. But in fact, there are a few students who do not care about other people.
sents: ['One of the famous social institutions amnesty international has more members than ever before and the interesting thing about their members is that they are more young people than adults which seems to negate the common sense that young people are egoists and prefer to do more for themselves than for other people. The important and connecting fact in this diverse thesis is that there are more young people who are social engaged, usually work for different organisations, but also try to look for their own interests and career. There are a lot of pupils and students who work during their free time for non-profit institutions like places where homeless people can find food, clothes or a place to stay during the cold season. And also there are many students who choose their subjects at university in social areas like medicine or law to help other people. But the important distinct of now and the past is that young people do not go to demonstrations or show their political understanding in society like their parents twenty years ago. The young adults combine their modern life with their own car and expensive clothes with social engagement.', 'But in fact, there are a few students who do not care about other people.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Some people say it's better to specialize in one specific subject. But I think it's better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects for two reasons. Therefore, I agree with this statement. There are advantages to specializing in one thing. And also it's needed in some occupations. An example which makes this clear is that a pilot needs special knowledge about an airplane and how to fly it. But I find more advantages to studying many academic subjects. First, I think if their knowledge is broad, They can have a wider view. For instance, as the internet has been invented and a better transportation system has developed, you go abroad more frequently. Also you become to see many people who have different backgrounds. At that time, you have to recognize and understand other cultures or history. If you don't have a wide view, you can't understand and it may be a conflict. Second, today , it's a really complicated connected society so it's really important to study several academic subjects. For example, if you are a doctor, you must know how new machines work too.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I am in accordance with the statement that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. The reason why I am in agreement with this is that I suppose that successful people are dedicated to making better in any way they operate, and they want everytime a new target, much more difficult from the past, to obtain. For this reason they try new things and sometimes they take risks but this gives them the sensation of the power and the potential they have. The normal people see them and consider that in the same situation or position they didn't take risks fairly like successful people do. Infact normal people many times, consider successful people too much out of the world for the reason that I mentioned at last. Contrary to what ordinary people think I consider that successful people go in another way from normal people because, if it is not true, they can be successful people. The success of a person is given first of all by nature because a successful person, before he had success, he was born with a particular ability in speaking, playing in general and making better wath he had to do, respect other people. With the growth of the person, success comes to the people that had this particular ability since they were young and for this reason they became "effective" successful people. Society in general considers that taking risks is the best way to safeguard or die. I support a different position, and this is that if a man doesn't take many risks in his life continues to be the ordinary man that he is. But if a man takes many risks (not everytime, but sometimes) it is a sign of that he could be a successful person. The successful people have to their part the luck, infact sometimes they do an activity with much more success than normal people could obtain.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Many young people enjoy their life, but not every one enjoys it. Many people fail their life and do not enjoy their life. The happiness of life depends on what people do in their life to be happy and whether the people are satisfied with the result. The statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do can not be true in all situations. Most people have bad things happen in their life. It could happen at any stage of life. Some people have more than one bad memory which causes them to suffer a lot of distress and depression. Many teenagers have a great number of stresses caused by academic, and social problems. Many teenagers get too many stresses and sometimes, those stresses lead to suicide. On the other hand, old people, who retired or are almost retired have nothing to worry about, but their health. Worry is one of the biggest causes of diseases. the body does not function well when people worry too much. Old people don't have a lot to worry about. But the Old people have a higher percentage of being hurt, or dying. Dying isn' t really bad if the person did everything they had wanted to do and if they are satisfied with their life, but not everyone is satisfied with their life like stated in the beginning of this essay. People want something more all the time. Youngsters want to become adults, older people regret their life back in the past and want to live their life again.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: The phrase quoted "YOUNG PEOPLE NOWADAYS DO NOT GIVE ENOUGH TIME TO HELPING THEIR COMMUNITIES" is a factor that lots of adults think may be true. But, I totally disagree with this. The youth of today are very enthusiastic about their given responsibility, their job & their concerns regarding the work that they need to put forth. In this fast paced life of today, with severe competition that comes along from every corner of their life, this makes it impossible for young people to dedicate much time toward their community or to take any social cause they want to do. They are so engulfed in the work, they already have very little time to just be by themselves. Well one may consider that these are the reasons for a youth not to do the helprequired. But, I would like to say that inspite of the hardlife they have developed these young people never forget where they are & what they stand for. Many young people take time out of their busy schedule to dedicate time to the community they live in. These young people have actually even started making their voices heard. For example, the recent Medical Quota that the government had proposed for the benefit of the so called lower class of the community at the expense of merit was greatly put forward by the Medical students. Not because they did not want the upliftment of the community, that was socially biased by are administrators, but for the fact that they just wanted these seats to be given to the more deserving students who may be in a very economically challenged & brilliant student. Today's youth are more about general development than development in a particular area. They just love experimenting in life. The youth of today have gone ahead of their voice to stand for their opinion, to stand for themselves in the purest of all the heart that is needed. Inspite of the on going corruption which  is eating our nation from every corner they still want to eradicate it for a.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Knowledge is power. Without knowledge we cannot go higher in education. It is one of the essential parts for every person in the world to take part in it. I strongly agree with the statement that students should understand the ideas and concepts better than it is for them to learn facts. The main important point is that without understanding the ideas the student cannot learn the facts. Learning facts is the secondary thing for a student and the primary thing is to understand the ideas and the concepts. For example: While doing the experiment in the lab we would like to have a concept and the idea, what are the specifications of what are the input and output of the experiment. The student can do the experiment by having the priority knowledge of that experiment. In my 12th standard i didn't attend the class in which the lab was done the next day. I directly went into it to do it but i am unable to do that experience.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The numbers of cars increase everyday. People who do not have cars buy cars. This will be a controversial situation in the future, the number of cars in twenty years will increase or not. Too many cars will cause traffic problems, people will not go to their jobs on time. In my opinion, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today because of the improvements in new transportation systems. In future, the underground transportation system is going to improve, as the construction technology is improving. It is going to be easier to build new tunnels for the subway in every part of the city. The number of subway stations will increase in future. As a result, people can travel easily around the city. For example, in one station there will be five or more lines, which will have different directions. In cities, people prefer to use subways without having park problems, traffic jams, taxes. Also, the resources of petreloum are decreasing everyday, so prices are increasing and cars have become expensive transportation vehicles. The second reason for not using cars is going to be the scooters. As the improvements made in the electricity engines are applied to the scooters. For example, the shuttle scooter was started to sell in the market and people were interested in it. In twenty years people will be using scooters instead of cars. The third type of transportation vehicle is the plane which causes the fall of cars in twenty years.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: With this set of materials I'm really disagree! Cars will be fewer is a fantastic future! In fact in recent years the number of cars on the road has multiplied! Only if an organization like a GOVERNMENT or a much more important like ONU or NATO will make some measures like laws for this problem will we see fewer cars turn around! Mysys is supported from the known of human mind! Some years ago people every day walked , went by bike or took a bus to go to work, to study or to do other things! Today man is able to buy a car and use it for his things, this because the world has changed and is changing! Many years ago people got up in the morning and thought about what the best ways to find food were? Later in the years when man got up, he thought: How can i do to live better? This is one of the means of evolution! So, I'm sure, next year people will think, for example, how many cars can i buy to live better? Another example to support my opinion you can find in recent years. Family ten years ago had only one car for the family, and that father usually used. Today for each family you can find a maximum oftwo cars, one for a wife and one for a husband. Now the number of cars is increasing and next year you will see better in one family every component of a family has a car! I know some of my friends that have two cars for each one.

According to many people; specializing in one specific topic provides them with several opportunities to express a subject but i strongly believe that having broad knowledge is more advantageous. You can work on many topics; you can demonstrate your knowledge to others and you can improve yourself; First of all; if you are familiar with some kinds of topic; you can easily predict the subject and understand the mainstream. And also you can give a speech about the topic eventhough you dont know everything about thesubject. Secondly academic subjects are related to each other so you can find the transitions and you can realize the connections between the subjects. For example you are a professor at a university and your department is biology but a chemistry professor can not be able to reach school so that you can give a lesson about chemistry by using a relationship between these two subjects.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are one of the modern modes of transportation nowadays, which are commonly used by everyone. Cars can make our lives easier by saving us time and energy. As cars are getting more and more commonly used, the energy needed for cars is getting lesser and lesser. As a result, the energy crisis occurs, and which becomes one of the most important daily issues to us. I believe in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, because of the scarcity of energy, and the innovation of technology. It is obvious that there are more and more cars on the streets nowadays. But has anyone aware of the huge loss of energy? Probably not. Cars will not work without gasoline. As more and more gasoline is purchased, it becomes scarcer. In the economic view, when a good or service is getting scarced, the price of the individual good or service will increase. That is what's happening with gasoline nowadays. As the price of gasoline rises, the living expenses also increase. In the end, people will not use cars as much as we do now. And this is because of the scarcity of energy needed for cars. When the situation of scarcity of energy is happening, people tend to find many ways to solve this problem. The innovation of transportation might be the solution to this problem. Scientists who work on energy development might create new energy instead of the traditional energy, gasoline. With the help of these scientists, the solution will either be having new forms of energy, or new forms of cars that consume less gasoline. Therefore, traditional cars will no longer be used in twenty years. In conclusion, the scarcity of energy and the innovation of technology can reduce the number of cars in the next twenty years. Scarcity of energy leads to the rise in living expenses, which will finally force people not to use cars as much as they do now. The innovation of technology will help develop new forms of energy that will not be used by cars, and new tools of transportation other than cars.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are some people who think travelling led by a tour guide is better, but others prefer to travel alone instead of being guided by a tour guide. But I would have to say, if I was faced with this issue, I would probably follow the tour guide's leading in a group. In the following discussion, I would like to reason and provide examples to support my viewpoint. No issue is more important now than the one that refers to safety. History witnesses and presents many examples of when travelling by oneself may cause some dangers or trouble. For example, we go to a less developed country,such as China, and take money in hand, this behavior may cause some dangers. Or when we travel to an European country with unpolished dressing. Don't you think the examples quoted above are very persuasive? Convenience is another head and chief reason that I have chosen to put it here. It is no better illustration that can demonstrate the view. If the trip is not convenient, it will take the travellers too much energy to enjoy their trips. Even family as a couple. they will be uncomfortable on a busy trip. Superior as leading by a tour guide, leading by tour guide or deciding on a trip by yourself also has its own demerits, too. Deciding on a trip course may take a lot of time and may lose something interesting. Leading a tour guide may lose one's freedom to find something else besides the tour. Nevertheless, the advantages of leading by a tour guide carry more weight than the disadvantages of leading by a tour guide. So the most striking conclusion is obvious. To sum up, given the reasons discussed above, which sometimes intertwine to form an organic whole and thus become more persuasive, we can safely reach the conclusion that leading by a tour guide on a trip is more safe and convenient. In fact, not only do I prefer to travel leading by a tour guide in a group, but also prefer to hire a personal tour guide for one's own tour guide to serve himself as well as possible.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In Korea, students who are before entering a university should memorize most of everything to prepare for the university test. Why should we memorize everything? I think understanding those things and experiencing them are more important than just learning. There are a number of reasons. First of all, If students just memorize ideas and concepts for their goals such as entering a university, getting a job, and graduation, will they remember it a long time? I think the answer is "NO". Because their ultimate goals are not learning and understanding for themselves. Thus, they have just studied to enter a university and if they enter a university, they will forget it easily because they have got their goal yet. Second, if students don`t understand ideas and concepts, those will be futile. It is because although they study those things, they don ` t try to understand ideas. If they didn`t understand, would they use the knowledge? and then can we call that  knowledge "? The learning that is not being understood is just waste. I think rather that you should not know those better than it.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement. Whether people enjoy their life or not depends on them, so it is difficult to say clearly. But, I think many young people may enjoy their life rather than older people, so I agree. Because, firstly, they have a lot of time to do something. Of course they may have to go to schools, after the classes they have plenty of time. So, they can do what they want, for example, play with friends, play sports, go to amusement places, read books, and so on. Second, they have little responsibility to society. Older people must deeply contact others, so they have responsibilities to society, but young people do not.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. In my opinion, I think all companies do. I think a lot of people could agree with this statement if they have their own experience of it. Actually, the main goal of advertisements is to make huge profits by selling the products. To do this, they should make a good image of the product, and the product should appear to a lot of people. If it looks not good in the advertisement, people will not buy it. So, this skill is very important to sell the product to the consumers. Sometimes, people buy something without any information. I think this is because the advertisement already built their nice image on people's minds. I have my own experience to support this. When I was in my country Korea, I saw an advertisement for a mini radio from a famous company. It looked really cool and useful to me, so I wanted to buy that mini radio. It was brand new and it was much smaller than mine. I always wanted to have a small radio that I could take everywhere. I ordered that mini radio after I watched the advertisement on television, and when I received it I was surprised. She was not that small. It was just ' a little' smaller than a regular radio However, in the advertisement that I saw, it looked so small such as my little MP3 player. I was very disappointed and I gave that to my older brother. After that mistake, I never ordered the product just by advertisement. Actually, it was not a'mini' radio.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I do not think travelling in a group led by a tour guide is the best way to travel. There are some reasons I do not like them. First, the tour will limit us to where to go. Although it will be much cheaper than going alone the tour might not be what you hadthought. You might want to see around other places but since it is moving with the group, you will not be able to go by only your feelings. Secondly, the tour guide will decide the time they are looking for, so you are not able to see it as long as you want. Different from travelling by yourself, a tour wants to go to as many places as possible to have more customers. So they are not able to take enough time to see each place because they have to go next on time. This might be OK for some people, but others might think they are not satisfied. Thirdly, there will be many other people that you do not know. This will make you feel tired and have no pressure.
