Although it will be much cheaper than going alone the tour might not be what you hadthought. You might want to see around other places but since it is moving with the group, you will not be able to go by only your feelings. Secondly, the tour guide will decide the time they are looking for, so you are not able to see it as long as you want. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The technological development today has also proved itself in the fields of automobiles. So it can't be said that there will be fewer cars in use in twenty years than today. Though there are problems which are faced today due to pollution and resources decline , our technology has solutions to each and every problem. There are many technological innovations in the field of automobiles,and year by year many new designs and varieties of cars are being invented for more comforts. The cars which are designed today use less fuel and they are pollution free,which will be going to improve further in the next twenty years. The cars which run on biogas are presented on the market ,they are creating no pollution,the fuel used is cheap and is available easily in the atmosphere too. Though they are in less use today because of their high cost they may be used in the future in large demand according to the manufacturers' assumptions because the costs of production of these cars may decrease in future. Moreover in the coming years the world will be more developed and will be very busy too. Fast travelling media is necessary for every one who works away from home or goes to colleges etc. Even the ordinary man can afford a car because their costs will be reduced due to high production and can drive the car too. Just like the costs of two wheelers have decreased the costs of cars are also expected to decrease further so that the ordinary man can alsoafford the car. because the large population of the world is of middleclass people. Also the use of more advanced cars which run on biogas ,a pollutionfree fuel will become a must to reduceatmospheric pollution , The use of these cars will be more demanded among the rich people for the sake of their prestige and pride because they are more expensive cars.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are some reasons to agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. First, tour guides have knowledge of the travel place. A tour guide can introduce important parts of a place and important objects. For example, Our family went to New york, in 2004. At that time, we didn't have a tour guide. The first time, we feel ok. When we leave that country, we don't have some knowledge of that country. We feel very bad. But tour guides cover this kind of thing. Secondly, tour guides give safety. Other countries have different people, different society and different places. If we have no tour guide, we can get lost or become dangerous from other people. For example, I see an article in a newspaper. That article's story is dangerous for sole travel. In that article there are two students. Two students enjoy their trip. But on the last day, one student goes to some place. That student lost the way. Suddenly, a gangster kidnaps that student. People can't find that student.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the fact that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are, but there are several reasons for this and it is not always the case. With the huge rise in consumption society, more and more products are proposed to the customers. Most of the products are really similar. How does the difference between two bottles of water which have the same price make a difference? This is the role of communication and advertising. Companies will present the products in a better way. They will associate it with a lot of qualities and significations. With advertising, companies create the image of the product, and this image makes the difference when the customers buy the products. So, the customers don't have to mix the real qualities and specificities of a product and his image. For example, a brand of water shown in one of his advertisements is about babies dancing and swimming in waters. That doesn't mean that each person who drinks this water becomes a baby and jumps directly into a swimming pool. A second problem for companies is how to sell a cake or a fragrance by advertising? People can't taste or smell the product. Consequently, advertisements suggest the flavour or the taste of the product, and as everybody has his personal tastes and preferences, everybody doesn't always agree with the advertisement. Finally, advertising doesn't always present the products in a better way than reality. Advertisements are controlled by law and the associations of customers. Companies can't lie about theirproducts, lying advertising is punished by law and in this case the company loses all its credibility and the trust of itscustomers. To conclude, advertising makes a product seem better to make business. It doesn't lie, it improves the reality.

With the huge rise in consumption society, more and more products are proposed to the customers. Most of the products are really similar. How does the difference between two bottles of water which have the same price make a difference? This is the role of communication and advertising. Companies will present the products in a better way. They will associate it with a lot of qualities and significations. With advertising, companies create the image of the product, and this image makes the difference when the customers buy the products. So, the customers don't have to mix the real qualities and specificities of a product and his image. For example, a brand of water shown in one of his advertisements is about babies dancing and swimming in waters. That doesn't mean that each person who drinks this water becomes a baby and jumps directly into a swimming pool. A second problem for companies is how to sell a cake or a fragrance by advertising? People can't taste or smell the product. Consequently, advertisements suggest the flavour or the taste of the product, and as everybody has his personal tastes and preferences, everybody doesn't always agree with the advertisement. Finally, advertising doesn't always present the products in a better way than reality. Advertisements are controlled by law and the associations of customers. Companies can't lie about theirproducts, lying advertising is punished by law and in this case the company loses all its credibility and the trust of itscustomers. To conclude, advertising makes a product seem better to make business.", "It doesn't lie, it improves the reality."]

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Young People And The Community I think that I would have to agree with this statement, according to nowadays young people dont help or participate enough in their own communities, and I mainly think that this is because of the world today and its busy busy busy life. Because nowadays a lot of young people can't even afford to lose time on playing or engaging in any kind of fun activities, Because they can barely make it from home to college and from college to their part time work (if they have one) and then going home again to do their chores and finish studying and doing their homework , which takes a lot of them dropping them beat on the bed at the end of the day. But then again this does not apply to every young person, some people choose not to participate in their own communities because they do not think that the community itself is not doing a good job maintaining things at hand, and so they dont want to interfere with the bumpy roads ahead. But also there is quite a fair amount of young people with plenty of free time who would love to help their communities to prosper and to feel good about them selves as individuals in doing so, and not to forget that working pro bono for the community means no money, and not many people who would want to waste their time and not get paid in the end, so sticking to their jobs is the better answer for their time. So in conclusion, I do agree with the statement that young people dont give enough time to help their own communities, but at the same time I disagree that they should help the community and give their time and efforts away on the count of their futures, but this does not apply to those young people who dont think and give much time to their future or their community because they should, after all,.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The teachers teach us a lot of different things. They always teach us that understanding the idea and the concepts of each article is more important than learning the facts. Even though we are students or the teachers. First, understanding the ideas and concepts is to make sure that you know everything about this story or article. If you did not understand what it was talking about, you would never get the facts of it. My English teacher always says that way to me. If we want to learn good English, we should read it more than once to understand the idea. It likes the characters, setting, plot, and the background. When we can get all of the above, we will understand the ideas and the concepts. Trying to read it more than once, it would be easier to get what it says in the reading. I always do that way, because I want to get higher marks for every test or quiz. When we do that, we will learn more when we read. Learning the facts is not really a bad thing to learn. It depends on different people to learn. Everyone also has his own way of learning. We won't learn or follow the others' lead. Everyone is different. No one is the same.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I agree with the statement that it is better to have broad knowledge rather than specialized in one specific area. This is because everything in this world is related to each other and you cannot solve any problems or do something new without having other knowledge. For instance, cooking, chemistry and biology seem all different subjects which don't have a relationship with each other. However, they are strongly connected with each other and you won't be able to do any cooking without having knowledge of chemistry and biology. You might think not all people cooking at home have had a chemistry class and biology class. I take your point; what you have thought is absolutely true. What I want to say is that you don't need to have professional and deep knowledge of them. For example. if you want to cook meat, what do you do first? This is maybe depending on what meat you are going to cook and how tough it is and how big it is. If this meat is too big to cook or eat, you need to cut the brock into smaller pieces.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Every one of us dreams of enjoying his life during all his living period until his last day. But I personally think that young people enjoy life more than old people. First young people have less responsibilities toward the family, so they have much more liberty to do what they want and to go wherever they please. They could enjoy their life by traveling or taking risks in some adventure , doing dangerous things or crazy things, while old people have their families and their responsibilities to take into account. Young people also could go to some entertainment places with their mates such as pubs and discotheques where there is so much noise that old people couldn't bear it. There are also some nice places that are open exclusively for young people , old people are note permitted to enter them.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" I agree with this statement. Probably the secret of many successful people might be this only. If people go on with the well known things they might feel their life boring and they can't think innovatively ,which leads to missing their success hence the fame or reputation. For example a man could not be a scientist unless he tried to invent or invent a new thing. For instance take the astronomers who would always think of doing something or discovering or analysing something new from the space which a simple man ought to do , making them to do ricks like space travelling. Evenif they fail once they will try anyway in their lives for new things. Which makes them great successful citezens. I was always encouraged by my father to do new things so that i could give wings to my mind and think beyond and become a successful guy in my society. which brought me several prizes by participating in the science fair. Also when people try to do new things they will adopt them and they will get habituated to them despite the difficulty. Also trying new things would also give some self satisfaction for oneself. If we do a new thing and succeed in it we feel proud ofthat. It will also be fun to do new things. Kids usually have this behaviour is that they would like to play always with new toys or other things which they like the most. A candle light would be so attracted that they would like to touch it which may cause rick for them but unknowingly he does it and finds out what would happen if he touchesharmful things. That is trying new things will make a person learn new things which helps him through out his life Finally i conclude that going for newer things makes a man more.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people believe that young people enjoy life more than older people , but from the daily life point of view I think that also older people can enjoy life in many ways. In this modern society, cities,towns, and also little countries offer all aged people the right ways to enjoy life. Young people can meet each other in disco clubs, pubs, cafes and spend their time together. The same things can be done also by elderly people, if the health is good. Maybe, in my opinion, young people can enjoy life with more sports than older people. Young people have a young body with many energies to spend.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: The issue of advertising is topical. I mean that currently you are always in relations with some kind of advertisement like in TV or in newspapers or on the internet and it is difficult not to take it in count and after not comparing the quality of the product with what you thought it would be. From my point of view, i agree with that statement for several reasons. First ,one of my reasons is one of my experiences. One day i bought a chimical liquid in order to clean my kitchen and i was really disappointed with the result moreover the price was expensive for the result i had in comparison with what they show on TV. Second ,if i was a businessman, I think my goal would be to get the most profit that i can. Thus ,i will buy poor material and then manufacture it , sell it, and use advertising to show why my product is better than an other one. So i will just emphasize all the qualities. From my opinion, it is a common way to do business, and advertising is business. Third,i am convinced that some advertisements lie about their products just because it exists some associations to defend customers' rights against. if you do not appreciate the service or the product you bought you can go to their type of association and charge in court the company of the product.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In many schools and institutions it is believed that the importance of learning is by memorizing facts and concepts other than actually understanding them. We are facing two very different types of learning and teaching, and I personally think that the best way is to integrate and comprehend. In the older days, teachers left instructions for the students to memorize and copy facts, dates, names, numbers, among other things. Then, the student wouldn't have passed even 1 year and he would have forgotten everything the History teacher told him to memorize about the second world war. It wouldn't have been of any use memorizing in the first place. Now, on the other hand, I think that a more modern type of teaching is by making the student identify the problems and understand the answers. For example, in mathematics or physics, instead of the teacher giving the formula to meassure the air, or to find a number, let the student find the formula by himself. In a way, I think this type of teaching helps the student to develop certain abilities and its easier for them to solve problems in the near or distantfuture. I think it is very important to actually use the whole percentage of brain we are capable of using and to think, and figure out our own answers. We are not born with the abilities we have, but we reforce them, make them stronger. In my personal opinion, it is much more important for us (students) to understand and comprehend ideas and concepts than it is for us to learn and memorize them. Besides, memorizing is always boring. Its funner to learn by applying this type of teaching.

We are facing two very different types of learning and teaching, and I personally think that the best way is to integrate and comprehend. In my personal opinion, it is much more important for us (students) to understand and comprehend ideas and concepts than it is for us to learn and memorize them. Besides, memorizing is always boring.", 'Its funner to learn by applying this type of teaching.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people keep enjoying, sometimes indulging, their youth. They believe that young people enjoy life more than older people do. So they have to consume their limited youth for enjoyment. I have to say such an idea is inappropriate since enjoying life is not a priority for young people. There are many types of enjoying your life, no matter whether you are young or older. Everyone, at any age, can find his or her way of enjoyment. Young people are physically energetic so that they can climb mountains, play Internet games, play basketball and do disco dances.

Everyone, at any age, can find his or her way of enjoyment.', 'Young people are physically energetic so that they can climb mountains, play Internet games, play basketball and do disco dances.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Some students prefer to gain ideas and concepts, but I prefer learning facts. Facts are mandatory to learn history and culture, practical exposure improves man's ability, and soul satisfaction. First of all, facts provide ancient history and culture. If one experiences an incident one never forgets that incident. There is a proverb that says " history never repeats'. we can get more knowledge from the past and our experiences. History of our forerunners helps us to live life made easy. Now scientists are discovering new things based on the past history of theories. Secondly, practical knowledge is better than abstract knowledge. Our personnel experiences help us to guide us in how to deal with issues in the future. Facts enable man's ability and empowers confidence. For instance, based on clinical tests scientists are discovering new drugs but not abstract ideas and concepts. Ideas and concepts are visionary but facts are saving human lives.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. When I was a high school student, I usually learned just facts. It was a system of korean education. For example, in math class, I could learn a lot of information in a short period. However, I usually got low grades in each test. Because the teacher changed the style of problems in each test, I could not use such factors which I learned before. That's why I think understanding ideas and concepts is more important. Next, if I understand ideas and concepts of problems, I can use them in our lives. For instance, I learned the effective value of electronic products through my physics class. Therefore, I can save on utility fees because I can find which products are more effective than others in the home. Finally, if we knew about concepts and ideas of some accidents, unfortunate accidents would never happen in the future. For example, if we just know factors of invasion from other counties, the invasions would be faced again because we did not know how to prepare them. Obviously, it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. We can use ideas and concepts in our lives and prevent bad accidents.

For example, if we just know factors of invasion from other counties, the invasions would be faced again because we did not know how to prepare them. Obviously, it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.", 'We can use ideas and concepts in our lives and prevent bad accidents.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: When i was fifteen years old ,my father told me something which i have never forgotten,and actually it helped me many times, he said "try to know small things about every subject and try to know everything about one subject". For that i tried from that time to identify which kind of sciences i should specialize in, and what are the related sciences which i should know about. I decided to specialize in structural design engineering and that forced me to do well in the academic subjects dealing with that science. but i find that to do that well i should have a good knowledge of mathematics , physics,mechanics and sometimes medical subjects. It seems to be strange, how can some medical subjects related to related to structural design ? the answer is the way the human being stands with his bones is similar to the way of structure to.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is debatable that teenagers, these days, put the time to help their communities. a rapidly growing number of people think that young people also help their communities because they belong to a wide range of groups and those groups participate in helping communities. In contrast, I strongly believe that students do not spend their time helping their communities because they not only focus on more difficult exams, but also tend to become self-centred. First of all, these days, a lot of difficult exams or tests make students spend more time. Young people study hard to enter more prestigious universities. Thus they focus on studying rather than helping their communities. According to research by Chosun-ilbo, one of the leading newspapers in Korea, a number of students who give the seats to the elder or visit the pagoda or silver house. The research indicates that 70% of students respond that they do not have enough time to think about other things, instead of studying. On top of that, teenagers do not think about whether other people are poor or not. They have a tendency to self-centred. In the past, many students considered their communities when communities had special parties or festivals for reconstitution of communities, so they frequently helped install tools or stages. The best example of this is that my father helped make stages for the rural festival of harvesting. He said that at that time, most students who lived in their communities gave their hands in order to succeed the festival. On the other hand, when our communities have a beach festival every summer, even though our communities ask for help, no students emerge from the cite to install stages, hence the festival failed. In this respect, at present, students are self-competent compared to the past.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I completely agree with the statement which says that " Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well". Those people,who are well known, often want to be more popular and to attract more and more attention. We can talk about politicians as an example. Like Bill Clinton,former president of the United states of America,or Nelson Mandela,ex-president of South-Africa,who are helping the poor countries in africa and asia, a lot of this category of people work in organizations which have the same purpose. Another example is the entertainment artists. Many singers after being very successful and popular as singers try to move to Hollywood where they have the opportunity to start acting. And they even take a lot of risks like investing in a lot of businesses all over the world. The benefit for them is that they are known and they use their name to attract people;and even if their investment does not succeed , they are always able to try other things because they have the money they need. In the United states a lot of artists,singers and sports -players have their own company or team. Consequently,months after months,years after years, they become more and more successful and popular and try new things. Consequently,they seem to handle the world in the palm of their hands. In conclusion,people who are successful definitely try new things and risk;they rarely just do what they already know how to do well and most of the time, they do it to get more money thanthey own.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I strongly agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I think young people have less resources than older people. Older people have to earn money and take care of their family. For this reason, old people abandon their time and life for their family. Otherwise, young people do not have such a responsibility. They spend most of their time on their own life. In my case, I spend my time on playing games and sports, doing hobbies or watching movies. However, my parents can not enjoy what they want to do. They work every day to support us. Therefore, I think that enjoying life depends on the happiness of responsibility. For other reasons, young people are more energetic than old people. Even if someone really enjoys playing harsh sports but is not energetic enough, he can not do those sports.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I disagree with the points made above that having knowledge of all the things is better compared to having knowledge of one specific field. As it is said it is better to be the master of one thing rather than the jack of all trades. i have different reasons to counteract it. Take the example of the following cases: 1. if the above fact would have been true then at university there would be no specialization in any subjects and all the students would opt for all the subjects. but in the current scenario this is not applicable in any part of the world which itself is an evidence of the effectiveness of the above logic. 2. take the example in the medical field. as time goes on new and new diseases are affectingmankind. in this situation only the person who has experienced in the corresponding field can go for research for the curement of that disease by means of biotechnology and will ultimately land up with some specific kind of solution. 3. take the example of the engineering field. how can we suppose to think that a person who has no experience in civil engineering and in construction will be able to make a dam for society. if he goes for this purpose the govt. will itself not allow that person to build it. even if by any means he is able to penetrate through all the hurdles then in that situation he can not give the guarantee about the dam which he built. So taking the above examples and facts one could easily conclude that for the betterment of society one has to undergo specialization which itself leads to betterment for.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: One of the big topics in this new century is the pollution of our world, especially of the air. To give our children a chance to live healthily in this world, there are some possibilities for air pollution: one of the most factors that cause air pollution is our cars. So a lot of states and countries think about strategies to increase the sum of cars in the next 20 years. They invest money in new and more economic bus-, train- or tube-systems. Using this transport system in the future has got a second advantage, too. In every big city, there is a parking-problem. But the cities are rising, too. And so every month there is a parking space for a new building. In future more and more people won't have an other possibility for arriving at their jobs than to use these public transport systems. So cars will be less on our streets. Another reason to disagree with this statement is the oil. In some years, there won't be as much oil as today on our earth and therefore the petrol price will rise in regions because many people won't be able to pay for it. Ok, there are inventions for non-petrol cars. But nobody really supports that because of the big influence of the oil industry. So a lot of people will sell their cars and move with public transport or trains. The third reason to disagree is that there will be new kinds of transportation-systems in 20 years.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Is a group led by a tour guide the best way to travel? I think it is, because when you go to a new place, sometimes you don't know the city well or you could take the risk of being missing. If you go to a new place, it would be better to be guided, so that if you have any doubt or any question, you will be sure that the guide will have the answer. You do not have to be concerned about knowing everything about the places, the buildings, the ways and you will only enjoy the trip. On the other hand, if you travel by yourself, without a guide, you must ask for some address or building name if you do not know it. It would take more time, it could be frustrating and it could make you spend a lot of money on taxis, buying maps or getting back from wrong places. A tour guide is a person who knows the places that he or she is showing, and he or she would teach you some history, because he would talk to you about the places you are visiting, its origin, its name, about what it is made of and all kinds of things that would take a lot of time to learn. It is safer for a person to travel in a group and with a tour guide because they do not take the risk of visiting dangerous places. The tour guide would tell you what places are safer, at what time is better to be and the right moment. Travelling in a group could be better because you can learn from the other people. If you don't know the name of a specific building, another person could know and tell you. If somebody else does not know the history of a specific place and you do, you could teach him or teach her. It could be frustrating to be in a foreign place and ton to know something that you want to.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Do successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well? Successful people try new things. To be successful is to be the best and different. If we are different that means that we are always looking for new things, new ideas. The world is always changing like that. I think that the reason that makes people successful is that they are always changing and having new things. If these people are taking risks? Of course they do ! But who cares ! Taking risks makes us feel as if we are in life. Life has become more exciting. Successful people are not scared of losing but they can't support always doing the same thing.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree with this statement. I am only a high school student so I'm not really sure about how elderly people feel. But I'll state three reasons which I'm sure about. They are; we are all the same human beings, generation really doesn't matter, all people feel joy at different times. The first reason why I disagree is because, we are all the same human beings. It's true that the elderly as our grandparents lived in a difficult time such as the world wars. Eventhough I believe that they also had an enjoyable young age. For me, everything was fun when I was a little girl. watching ants in a line was even enjoyable. Therefore I'm not sure how our thoughts will change through when we get older, but'm I'm still sure that we won't forget. memories. The second reason is because, looking at my grandmother makes me feel the age doesn't matter to enjoy the events. She likes to go watching movies with friends and after coming back she always talks to me about how the movies were and what she did with her friends, with twinkling eyes. From these experiences I'm sure that she is enjoying her life as an elderly person. The last reason is because, I think that all people have different thoughts and feelings about the word enjoyment. I feel most of the things which made me feel happy were enjoyable. Even on the train watching other people sometimes makes me enjoyable.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The issue of whether it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than for them to learn facts is commonly discussed in our society. In my opinion the students' knowledge is improved when they understand not only the facts but the underlying ideas and concepts. In this essay i will support my answer with specific reasons and examples. Facts are definitely the students' knowledge base. Before any consideration the students need to know what happened. So teachers need to explain the facts without any comment or personal opinion. At a second, facts are separated into ideas and concepts. Teachers should help students to understand what drove the fact and what consequences it had. In our society is really important not only to know what is happening but also to understand the ideas and motivation. A great example is 11/09. Everybody saw what happened on the twin towers. The real knowledge comes from the understanding of nature and the cause of the terrorist attack. Only in this way can students go directly to the problem and try to find a solution. In conclusion I completely agree that students should analyse problems by learning the facts and understanding the ideas and concepts that are behind the facts. Only in this way will students be able to find the correct solutions to the problems that they will occur into.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays, there're so many debatable issues about young people's life style. In particular, some people think young people don't give enough time to helping their communities, so they look down on young people. However, I think the young generation spend enough time on their communities and they shouldn't spend more time helping communities. Because there's a major volunteering class ( in school), young people have numerous things to do without helping communities and young people's time is for dreaming. First of all, there're a lot of programs to make young people help communities, and almost all young people do it. For example, almost all schools force students to spend time helping communities in Korea. The required volunteer time is high, and connected with the grade. In that way, young people do help their communities. I think it is hard work for young people, and they have done well until now. Second, we should understand that the younger generation has numerous things to do and they want. When I think of the young generation from junior-highschool students to 30's, it's easy to guess that they are really busy. School, company, friends, family. Their heads are already full of things to concern them. In my case, I'm 21 years old, there're lots of things to do at my school and house. It involves homework, studying, housework. Actually, I couldn't breathe easily. There's no time to think about something unimportant. Like me, other young people have not enough time to draw the dream and future.

Actually, I couldn't breathe easily. There's no time to think about something unimportant.", 'Like me, other young people have not enough time to draw the dream and future.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: In my opinion, young people really enjoy their life more than older people do. As we see some examples, we can figure out how much young people enjoy their life. Using those examples, we can generalize young people. Young people have enough time and are healthy, so they can try many things which they want to do. For instance, if old people want to do sky jumping, they usually can not do that because their body is very weak, but young people can do that without worrying about physical problems. Besides, if old people want to travel the whole world, it will take a lot of energy, but old people can not deal with that.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: In my opinion, it won't be an exaggeration to say that young people do not spend time on their community. It is true that young people seldom do things for their community. The reason is simple. Young people have other things to do and; most of all, few young people have a sense of community. Seldom do young people in my country need to do anything for their communities. They are often told that they have to study hard. Their responsibility is to focus on their studies and their school work is always at the top of the priority list. To their "consederate" parents, things like helping their communities are taken as a bother to their children. Even if the task is as easy as cleaning the sidewalk around the community, parents will usually choose to finish by themselves rather than get their children involved. On the other hand, few young people nowadays have the sense of community. They don't even know who their neighbors are. How can it be possible to ask those indifferent people to pick up the garbage scattered in the house next to their house.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I think having knowledge of many academic subjects is better than specializing in one specific subject. There are two reasons and examples why I agree with this statement. If you have knowledge of general information, it would be useful in your life. For example, if you work in an office and your boss asks you to write a report, your knowledge would help you. Because you have different kinds of knowledge, you can think from different views. If you only have specific knowledge, you can only focus on one view which would make your report pretty poor. Knowing about many different things would help you at school as well. For example, because you have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, it would be useful in many situations, such as the examination and the interview. At the examination, you will surely get good grades because you have a lot of different knowledge, even though it does not specialize in one specific subject. Also at the interview, because you have different types of knowledge, you can answer the questions widely and you can appeal to how you understand general today's events and your cleverness as well. If you have knowledge which focuses on only one subject, it would be useless in many situations.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Twenty years is not a really long time for changing things in history. I think that in twenty years there will be more cars in use than there are today. Cars have changed people's lives, i can not imagine how our lives would be without having cars, cars help a lot for the human race. The reason why i think cars will not be fewer is that people need them. We need cars to get to work, school, and other places. Well ,some people will think about other modes of transportation. That is true, for a short distance we can walk or ride a bike, and for a long distance we have airplanes and trains. However i think cars are much faster than walking or riding a bike, and also cars are really flexible , we can go anywhere any time without an airplane or train ticket. we would have so much trouble without cars, they made our life easier. Cars are really convincing.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree in parts with the statement that "Young people enjoy life more than older people do ". The statement stated by the author seems to be correct in some situations and proves to be wrong in other situations making this statement as debatable. I will give some examples to prove my point in this essay. The statement of the author mentions " enjoyment of life ". This term is very relative in respect of people. Every person tries to live his life colourfully in his own way. If enjoy means partying then it may be possible that young people are doing it more frequently than older people but when it comes to celebrating then older people do not step back from the younger generations. I do agree sometimes because younger generations are having better and suitable conditions for the time to enjoy themselves. Young people are enthusiastic , active and having energy to enjoy the sports events by playing and cheering , they are very eager to explore new places. Young People having interests in movies go for it whenever they get time , They go for a picnic to have a change and the thing that generally many young people enjoy is to dance continuously for hours. They enjoy various foods of different tastes at many times. This can be termed as enjoyment. If we accept the author's statement then it would be like that older people are not enjoying but carrying their life ahead only. The things which are done by the younger generation are being done by the older generation earlier and thus they have lost the charm in those things and they do not have enough strength to do the same thing continuously.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Well, this is an interesting topic to be written about. Coming to the point of knowledge, it means mastering a field of work at study. And this is divided into many branches like different subjects we take. Many people try to take a few subjects or a single subject alone for their studies. This also counts for the field out of education system. This could be for the reason that they are interested in it and like to work on it. And moreover, people who are job minded, would work intensively on their subject of choice to master it and a good job based on it, leaving the other subjects unexplored! According to me, the involvement of a person in a particular type of job is totally need based. But I would prefer to work on all the areas and gain knowledge of everything around me, then concentrate on what I need to. This could be a pretty good way to do our job. You will have the minimum knowledge of everything. This ought to be followed because, you cannot keep quiet when a group of your friends is discussing a particular topic. You need not be familiar with it so that you can atleast join the discussion. Or else it would look odd if you did nt join in the talk. Afterall our skills are guessed by the work we put up. And we can also advise someone on a familiar topic we know. For example, lets take a person who is very well aware of a subject in which he is interested, but is unaware of many other things. And take a person who knows about all the things he is interested in, and also the other things. For instance let us imagine an interview conducted for each person. And in today's world, a person who knows his subject of interest and the other things also, is only accepted. That would keep him an allrounder. Though the other person is a master in his subject of interest, that alone would not help him. Lastly I conclude that, " A sight towards the alighter is always different from that towards a fish in a pond, which, though knows everything about the pond but never knows anything about the world around it.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Nowadays, some people prefer to travel through a travel agency while others prefer to travel by themselves. There are some advantages to traveling in groups led by a tour guide such as safety and getting some information about the place we travel from a tour guide On the other hand, there are some disadvantages such as following rules and no private time. I prefer to travel in a group led by a tour guide. There are three reasons why i prefer to travel through a travel agency. The first reason is that I am worried about safety when I travel. if we travel in a group, it is safer than travelling by myself. I heard some tragic stories about a couple in China. The couple who had just got married in Korea, went to China for a honeymoon.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Now there is a general debate about whether it is better for people to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects or to specialize in one specific subject. Different people have different ideas. As far as I am concerned, I think that it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects. There are a lot of reasons to support my idea, but I will only explain some of them due to the limited time. To begin with, if people have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, it will be easier for them to find jobs. That is to say that if you study a large amount of subjects, you may gain job opportunities very quickly and change jobs freely. A good example is the part-time job. If you have lots of knowledge of many academic subjects, you know both English and Ecnomics well, then there will be many jobs readily available for you. Working as a manager in a big company to show you economic skills during weekdays, you may teach English in a training school, standing in front of the blackboard, pronounce "A. B. C". This experience will be extremely interesting for you, you must enjoy it very much. The second reason is that you may be more intelligent by studying many academic subjects. Recent research has shown that people who learn knowledge in different areas will be more clever than those who only specialize in one scientific subject because these people's ideas are mangled to jump from one field to another field easily.

There are a lot of reasons to support my idea, but I will only explain some of them due to the limited time. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There are some differences between young people and older people. I want to explain important points about their characteristics. First, young people are more active because they have to go to school, they have to learn what their requirements  are. They also have to grow to become what they want to be. Though, they are growing up, there are a lot of struggles that they have to face. They are confused and lost because they can not see what is going to happen next. Second, think about older people who are calmer and have knowledge, and go done with their development. They can do whatever they want to do because they finish high school. They may have time to think about their grand children who they got. But there are things that they can not do which is going to school, playing sports beyond their average , being expert at some new thing. So some limits come up to them because their age is increasing. But it doesnt mean that young people enjoy life more than older people do. For example, if you want to have your own time to relax, sleep, talk with friends, it seems like young people have time for those kinds of things, but young people may not do it because there are a lot of things to do like home work, sports club, planning for university or job. But older people may do it because they have time, maybe they are having a job that they really want to do. School work is hard to have fun, there is such a limited time, they are still struggling with everything. Older people can enjoy what young people enjoy, if they want to play sports as much as young people do then they can do it. Young people can not do exactly the same thing as old people do.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree that most advertisements make a product seem much better than they really are. These days the advertising has become so popular that some people even have this belief that they can not sell a product at all with out advertising it on television or radio or wall posters. The first and the foremost thing in most of the advertising industry is presenting something bigger better or more unrealistic than the usual product. These days there are advertisements for everything from a mole hill to a mountain. And these days with the advancements in media (radio, television , the internet) the advertising has become so easy and so effective that it is delivered to each and every person and anyone who encounters that advertisement tends to buy that product. They are so impressive. Even if we go to a gas station there is a discount, for clothes, for medicines ,,,,, for every thing there is some bonus (so called) to the customers, which is just ,in my opinion, another start to improve their business and get profits. The other day i was walking in a street and i saw that on the other side of a road there was this man beginning with a note in his hand "need food" and when i looked at him and tried to walk away he had taken out another note with" Need booze" and asked me to give him some money for what ever note i liked. He really advertising more than his needs or showing something to others which isnt true. he has money but its just that he doesnt want to work at all. Here is another incident , i saw this advertisement in the news paper stating that there is a store wide discount with a note on the front of the shop"out of business store closing after 15 days" and i went there.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In this era, where it is possible to underline an increase in production, most advertisements can make products seem much better than they really are. This is a result of a great number of products that the owner of the companies has to sell to the consumers. For this reason i agree with that statement. I think that ,in this period, everyone who has to sell anything wants to show it in a better way than it really is. It is possible to find products that have a very low price but at the same time they are probably not very good items. Now where the Internet has increased its importance in selling products, all people try to show them in a fantastic state with beautiful pictures and one very accurate description. For example one year ago I bought a support for a mobile phone for the car. When it arrived at home I observed it and I noted that it was not as good as on the computer. The material that it was made of was very very bad and an optional item, that I bought with the support, didn't arrive at home. It' s possible to find a lot of advertisements on television that show all the items in a very beautiful way and I think that anyone has to pay attention before buying a particular product. I think it is better to buy items of a brand that is known. In this way you are sure to buy a good item if its price can be expensive. The most important brands have a great experience of working and they use all kinds of machines or material they need. In this capitalistic era infact there are many people that open an industry to sellingproducts. To have very low costs they use a material that is not good. This occurs for example in China where the prices of the products are very cheap. I had a lot of experiences with buying a product that were not good as they were shown, for this reason I suggest buying a very famous product! !.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.

So, in today's competitive world it is better to have broad knowledge of all academic subjects. if we have a broad idea of a lot of subjects,then the chances of success increase. If the applicant is attended for an interview for a post who is having good subject in various fields will be obviously selected rather than a person who is specialized in only one field,more over the person with diverse skills will face the interview with confidence. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.

I think most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. First, the purpose of advertising a product is to sell more. so, they can add some lies in order to sell more. For example, I remembered that one company makes an advertisement for a hair shampoo. In the TV, the advertisement introduced that when I use the shampoo, my hair changes to silk. that's a lie and exaggeration. but the company sold lots of them. Second, if they tell only facts about a product in advertisements, no one will buy the product. If I were an advertisement maker, I would not tell only facts. In fact, many companies try to show more better than to show more factually. It's of course  true. Third, no one intervenes in their advertisement idea hardly. many advertisements make products much better. But If one company only expresses their product they really are, the company willn't succeed. they have to sell their product. Therefore, the purpose of advertising a product is to sell more. and many companies try to show more better than to show more factually. and no one intervenes in their advertisement.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: "Big risks bring big opportunities" I can not remember very well but I heard it or read it somewhere which says that by taking risks you gain a chance to be well-off. I agree with this agreement and also agree that successful people are the ones who take risks and try new things. There are lots of things you can do to be a successful person. You should work hard, try to learn, and watch the new technologies. Although these make you successful they are not enough for being successful. For instance you can know every thing about your business \ you watch every improvement in your job, you work hard. However you do not have the courage to imply this information to your business. Then what are you going to do with them? People try new things and take risks in order to be successful. Firstly people should try new things. Today the world changes fast and you have to follow these changes in order to be successful. For example you have to learn theinternet, or how to control your e- mail. Nowadays every thing runs from the internet and by e-mail. Because it is one of the fastest and the cheapest ways to communicate with long distances. There are few people left who use letters to communicate. Secondly, I think this one is more important than trying new things is taking risks. Taking risks is the key factor that brings you success. If you always do what you already do really well you stay in where you are. Taking risks has concluded with different solutions and also higher revenues. However one important thing about taking risks is you should think carefully and be well prepared before you take the risks. Because besides big opportunities it can also bring sadness. I wanna give a great example from my country, Turkey. The founder of the Turkish Republic, Mustafa Kemak Ataturk. He took big risks during the period he wanted to found the Turkish Republic. But as a result he became successful. As a conclusion taking risksand.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: The world is big and there are lots of things that we are not aware of what happens around us. Most of us go to collages and try to be the best in our departments and graduate with high marks. But i think we miss something when we really focus on what we are doing. I think it is better to have a broad knowledge of many academic subjects instead of working on a specific one. I am a biologist. I graduated from university 3 months ago. I am a very hard-working and ambitious student. I always wanted to be the best and get high marks from the exams. I think i achieved this. But sometimes i think that whether it was good or not to have ambitions like me. When i look back to those days i think that i wish i had not so ambitions.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The reason that the younger generation seem to enjoy life more than the older generation is that they seem to have a greater ability to make what they desire come true. this could be because of the greater energy levels that the younger generation has when compared to the Old. The second reason is the flexible attitude that the young can take. they are easily adaptable to the situation and change accordingly and make the most of things, but on the contrary the old are not that flexible. they do not want to change from the normal routine work that they try to. they are very much used to the old work that they always do and thus they miss enjoying other works which they can.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: When I was 16 years old I traveled with my mother all around Europe. She paid a travel agency to have a guide on our trip. That adventure was amazing! if I had the chance to experience the same situation, I would not have second thoughts about paying a tour guide again. So I completely agree with the idea of traveling in a group led by a tour guide. First of all, I agree with paying someone to show me around because it is the best way to visit everything in a city, in which I do not know anything about. Furthermore, this guide can show me the history, the monuments, the anecdotes, traditional restaurants and places to party, and all of these for the same price! For instance, on the trip that I mentioned at the beginning, the one that I did with my mother, this guide showed us every single place in France; actually my mother went by her self three years before we did and thank this guide she learnt new more things about Paris.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the opinion that nowadays most young people don't spend their time thinking and helping for the development of their communities. First, they are more and more interested in their own interests rather than social problems because of the bad economic situation. As the economic situation is becoming worse, young people lose their interest in society and only show their interest in their own benefit. Compared to the scene of universities in the 70s and 80s, today's university students don't seem to take action for their communities. In the past, university students were the symbol of efforts to make a better society. They had their own clear view towards community and spent lots of time taking part in developing society. However, today most young people think they don't have time to do that. Instead of that, they spend their time going to the private academies to develop their own career. Second, there are lots of things for youngsters to enjoy. They spend most of their time enjoying their own interests such as watching movies , shopping, or playing games. Fewer students take part in activities to help communities. When there was a chance to volunteer for the work in a rural area, it was hard to find students who were willing to go to my school. Instead of that, they wanted to spend time on their own interests. Moreover, whenever there are small student activities, the young are not interested in them. Out society members are becoming more individualistic than ever. So the young people ju.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Since World war 2 ended, the Young generation has enjoyed their life more than the olders. They, the Would-be Baby-boom generation, were good at various entertainment, and were exposed to splendid media such as Holly wood movies or Broadway musical shows. There are a few reasons why young people are better at having a great time than older people. First, young people know well how to play whenever they want eagerly. They know well where the best bar is, what the trend is going on, or who the most famous actor is these days. Of course older people have no time to have fun in order to get enough money for their family like a daughter who is interested in an expensive jewellerybrand. However young people don't need too much money because they have no one to be preserved. They just maintain their living costs which includes money to go to the best club in Soho. Second, young people are healthier than older people because they have a young and strong body that older people don't have. Old people have to pay for their medical care, medicines in order to maintain the body.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Today, more and more often old people are shown by society as slow and sad people. But this point of view is really restrictive and cannot be shared with everybody. First, to my mind, the definition of "enjoying life" can change with your age: not because you can enjoy yourself like before but just because your mind changes. For example, when you are a child, "enjoying your life" is just playing with your games. When you begin to be a teenager " enjoying life" is to begin going to clubs, in bars. When you are thirty years old, you need to enjoy life spending time with your friends or succeeding in your job. I think when you are young, it is really hard to understand enjoying life of older people because you did not discover what they lived and what they need. Then i think anybody needs to enjoy his own life with his own dream or his own hobbies. More when you become older, your body can accept everything it accepted when you were young.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Many people think, young people have enjoyable lives and they think old people do not enjoy life as much as young people do. I agree with people who think like that. I have several valid reasons which support my idea. First of all, young people enjoy life more because they are full of energy and that causes them to do anything at any time. For instance, if a young person decides to do something hard, that person achieves that aim very easily, but an old person can not do that thing easily and it causes disappointment and that disappointment makes the old person unhappy. For me an unhappy life is equal to an unenjoyable life. Secondly, young people have lots of time and because of that, they do not have to be in a hurry to do something , but old people think they have several years to live, so they try to do lots of things at the same time and that makes their lives unenjoyable. Young people are looking forward to the future but old people do not. Old people have disappointment about their past experiences but young people do not because they have lots of time to fix those disappointments. Last but not least, old people have health problems due to, their age. Because of that, they need to stay at hospital or need private support and I think that makes them live their lives unenjoyably. Young people do not have to spend their time in hospitals due to, health problems.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I whole heartedly disagree with the statement that younger people enjoy more than older people. Enjoyment is a feeling which is felt by people of all ages. There are certain times when each age group enjoys more than the other, all depending upon the problems faced by the age groups which are different in magnitude and time of occurrence. Both younger people as well as older people have problems to face in life. Each age group's enjoyment is curbed because of these problems, but the enjoyment is never far away. Lets take the example of a young boy. He does not enjoy it when he has to give exams, study, or go to school. However, he enjoys it when he goes to play, or when he watches television. In the same way an adult (middle aged) does not enjoy going to work, or working around his or her house. But they do enjoy it when they come back from work, when they are on a holiday, or when they go to a party. In the case of old people as well, they enjoy it as they do not have much work to do and live comfortably on their pension funds. But they face problems regarding their health. So this way every age group has its own share of enjoyment and problems. We cannot draw a fine line comparing who enjoys more or less as there are various factors such as time and society which decide that. Along with this there is also the fact that one's enjoyment can be another's problem. In contrast, children enjoy playing more and studying less. The adults (parents) have problems with that, which curbs their enjoyment of seeing their child study. When the child is forcefully made to study, then the parents' enjoyment becomes the child's problem. In the case of old people, their enjoyment is that they do not need to work. But this is a problem for adults ( middle-aged) as they become a burden on them. Due to this, old people are sent to shelter homes where it is a problem for them, but enjoyment for the adults.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: In the case of Latin America I think that it is better to have broad knowledge of different subjets because you can manage more activities and realize multi-task jobs. In my own experience, to find a job the recruiters ask you not for specific knowledge in a specific field. They ask you more about the knowledge in different areas that can help you to solve problems. In addition, when I was working I learned about different subjects because my job demanded it. For example, I am Electrical Engineering so I have a background in electronics and technical aspects, my last work was Project Management so I learned about Risk in the projects, financial stuff, logistics, management of human resources. I have a friend, His profession is architect and he reads a lot about different subjects because he is trying to apply mathematics, psychology, and marketing to the decoration of a room. He analizes the psychological profile of his clients and tries to design according to their interests and hobbies. People who have broader knowledge can manage more tasks and can do jobs that others do not know. Its easier to explain how to make something to a person who has knowledge in more fields. On the other hand, some activities require specialized resources for example people who repair, and build airplanes. Those works need specialized knowledge, but need more years of specialization in a field. In conclusion, I'm agree with the statement because for society its better to have people with knowledge of different branches.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I surely agree!. I am not happy to know this thing, but it is the truth. Advertising is made to convince people that a product is better than all the others. Nowadays the answer is fewer than purpose, so companies need to advertise their products to sell them. In this century, or better in the last fifty years the diffusion of mass media all over the world and the born and capital diffusion of television are the best "friends" of advertising's lies. There are a lot of psychological studies about human behavior to construct a perfect advertisement. There are also some ways to test if an advertisement has been remembered by the public or not. Somebody does a lot of research into behavior in the supermarkets or in the commercial centers, too. Nowadays you can argue that advertisements do not sell a product but they sell a dream. They imply. fulfilling that dream is easy: "you only need to buy that product or service! "However in real life it is different because what television spots suggest you, it does not occur. For example, washing products never function on their own and the first time you use them. when you wash something, usually you need to wash it more and more to clean it if it does not rest with rubbish on! As I have already written i am not happy about this thing but i hope that people will change this way of selling. i do not know how people can change this thing but I am sure that it will occur in a few years.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: "Don't judge the book by its cover" is a common saying in English to send a signal to people that they should not be deceived by whatever they see. However, it is not always true because there are other factors that could be borne in mind before approaching such a behavior by a lot of companies. As far as I am concerned , I disagree with the written statement for some economic and moral reasons. Economically speaking, it is true that all companies nowadays think of profits, but they do concern themselves with the satisfaction of the customer. These companies should take into consideration that if they got a customer from a customer, there is a possibility of losing a lot of customers. Especially in countries where customers have the right to complain about the low quality of product. A s a result , the company would lose a lot of money because other people would be encouraged to do so due to incoherent information being exposed in some advertisements. Therefore, companies should think about how much money that they might lose for such stupid behavior. They have already put a lot of money on the advertisement and they are not ready to lose more. Morally speaking, companies should keep a good reputation for the companies.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Facts can be researched by students in order to improve their knowledge of an idea. There are several ways to support the statement that it is more important to understand ideas and concepts than acquire knowledge of facts. Science requires students to think constantly and develop a critical way of thinking. For example, for a lawyer it is more important to learn how to think logically than to learn a set of laws in order to be successful in his career. A set of laws can change within one period of Congress; this will leave the given lawyer who just learnt a set of laws obsolete. He will need to go to university to learn again the set of laws to be useful in his field.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the statement that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. First of all, young people nowadays tend to care about themselves more than paying attention to other people. With a highly developed society, there are many more interesting and significant things occupying young people's minds. For instance, they would like to spend two hours or more reading books in the library or seeing videos and playing computer games at home instead of helping their communities which may gain them nothing in the near future. Furthermore, most young people nowadays are not aware of the idea of a "community" anymore. The identity of being part of the community is getting weaker and weaker. Some of them even don't notice about their living in a community. For example, apartments and houses have become the main style of buildings nowadays. Young people leave their houses in the early morning and come back to the very same place late at night. How can we expect them to know each other from their neighborhoods? This kind of lifestyle weakens young people's identity of community. Naturally, they will not pay attention to a society which they are unfamiliar with. Finally, considering this so-called efficient society, tasks relating to communities are almost done by certain workers or employees of these communities. In this way, a community becomes an epitome of a factory. Everyone has his own job and only does what he or she is asked to do. Take my family's community as a real example. We hired four people to do every task in our community.

For instance, they would like to spend two hours or more reading books in the library or seeing videos and playing computer games at home instead of helping their communities which may gain them nothing in the near future. Furthermore, most young people nowadays are not aware of the idea of a "community" anymore. The identity of being part of the community is getting weaker and weaker. Some of them even don\'t notice about their living in a community. For example, apartments and houses have become the main style of buildings nowadays. Finally, considering this so-called efficient society, tasks relating to communities are almost done by certain workers or employees of these communities. In this way, a community becomes an epitome of a factory. Everyone has his own job and only does what he or she is asked to do. Take my family\'s community as a real example.', 'We hired four people to do every task in our community.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do because they get more opportunities to play than older people. Another reason that young people enjoy life more than older people do is that they have much more energies than older people and by taking much more risks the younger people get more chance to experience and learn from their life. First of all, younger people get more opportunities to play than older people because they have enough motivation to enjoy playing. For example, at my age, my friends and I play often. We go hiking, dancing on the stage or in the clubs as well, and we also sing and listen to music, which is alot of fun. However, older people do not get alot of motivation like us, so they basically spend their spare time in their home or in the office where they work. Another reason that young people enjoy life more than old people do is that they have much more energies than old people. The old people are too old to go out and have fun because they do not have as much energy as young people. They are very tired from their work and from their house work. For example, my mom, who is a dentist, gets very tired from her work. When I saw her, her face was already sleepy.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement 'Young people enjoy life more than older people do. 'There were two main reasons for agreeing with this statement. They were 'variation of choice' and 'passionate'. For the first reason, young people can have more choice than older people do. Usually older people have less opportunities than young people have because of their age and also they have worse health than young people do. Also when older people get hurt, they recover slower than young people do becauseolder people 's cells are too old to reproduce themselves. This has caused older people's choices to become limited. For example, oldies cannot ride a ski or snowboard as young people do dangerous tricks because they have more risk than young riders have.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I think I agree with this statement. As far as I am concerned, I think that there are two ideas which can support this statement. First, recently environmental protection awareness has been rising rapidly. People nowadays realize that air pollution is getting worse and worse because of cars. Thus, in order to give their generations a better environment to live in, people may begin to decrease driving cars to the places they want to go. Instead, they will start choosing public transportation, such as MRT, tram, and bus, to get to the place they need to go. Moreover, the payment for a car is not cheap at all. For example, when you get a car, you have to pay for the oil and maintenance. I dare to say it will cost you more money than spending money on taking public transportation. Second, oil is becoming less and less though scientists have done their best to dig oil and find where oil can be. Oil is one kind of natural resource and the formation of oil must be very long, so it is not limitless. However, oil is essential for cars. Without it, people can not start cars at all; then, people will reduce using cars step by step. I think that the above I wrote can explain why there will be fewer cars than today. Just remember that the quantity of oil is limited and one day it will be gone,and the government have spent lots of money on establishing public transportation. Where does the government get the money to create public facilities? It is from people who pay taxes. So, we, people, have to enjoy what we have invested in and live better lives for our next.

Where does the government get the money to create public facilities? It is from people who pay taxes.', 'So, we, people, have to enjoy what we have invested in and live better lives for our next.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The issue at hand is whether young people enjoy life more than older people do or not. I disagree with the idea that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I believe that older people like life more than young people do for many reasons. First of all, old people enjoy life more than younger people do because they know they are very close to death. They know very well the meaning of death and they will die at anytime. For this reason, they try to spend their rest of their lives very effectively. On the other hand, young people feel that they never die and because of this, they are n't aware of the value of life. Additionally, old people like life more than younger people because they have many reasons to enjoy life. For example, they generally have children and a wife. They need to care about them. They enjoy life because of her family. On the other hand, young people do not have a daughter or son. They are single.
